Steam (ST): However, "spotted" is probably not the best word to describe that experience. ......It was more like our eyes were inexorably drawn to it.

Steam (ST): Grandfather succeeded the Ushiromiya family after it was destroyed in the Great Kanto Earthquake, and by successfully riding the stormy seas after the war, he managed to accumulate great wealth.
Umineko Project (UP): Grandfather succeeded the Ushiromiya family after it had been almost totally destroyed in the Great Kanto Earthquake, and by successfully riding the stormy seas after the war, managed to accumulate great wealth.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Grandfather succeeded the Ushiromiya family after it had been destroyed in the Great Kanto Earthquake and, by successfully riding the stormy seas after the war, managed to accumulate great wealth.
PC Japanese (JP): 祖父さまは関東大震災で潰れかかった右代宮家を継ぎ、戦後の荒波をうまく乗り切り莫大な富を手にした。
Russian (RU): Дедушка стал наследником семьи Уширомия после того, как она оказалась практически уничтоженной Великим землетрясением Канто, и, с успехом преодолев трудности послевоенных лет, сумел накопить огромные богатства.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele assumiu a liderança da família após ela ter sido destruída quase que por completo pelo Grande Terremoto de Kanto, navegando habilmente por mares tempestuosos após a guerra, o que o permitiu acumular grandes riquezas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 爺爺繼承了因關東大地震而奄奄一息的右代宮家，在戰後的怒濤中乘風破浪，得到了龐大的財富。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 爷爷继承了因关东大地震而奄奄一息的右代宫家，在战后的怒涛中乘风破浪，得到了庞大的财富。
Indonesian (IDN): Kakek meneruskan keluarga Ushiromiya setelah hampir hancur dalam Gempa Besar Kanto, dan dengan berhasil mengarungi masa sulit pasca perang, mengumpulkan kekayaan besar.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il Nonno è subentrato nella famiglia Ushiromiya dopo che era stata distrutta nel Grande Terremoto del Kanto e, dopo la guerra facendo calmare le acque, è riuscito ad accumulare una grande ricchezza.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il nonno subentrò nella famiglia Ushiromiya, distrutta dal Grande Terremoto del Kanto, e dopo aver solcato con maestria i mari tempestosi del dopoguerra, ottenne una vasta fortuna...
Turkish (TR): Büyükbaba, Ushiromiya ailesi Büyük Kanto Depremi'nde neredeyse tamamen yok olduktan sonra ailenin başına geçti, ve savaştan sonra fırtınalı denizlerde başarılı bir şekilde ilerleyerek büyük bir servet biriktirmeyi başardı.

Steam (ST): After the war, Grandfather correctly predicted what the future would hold and won in a huge gamble, accumulating a vast store of wealth, ......but there's a mysterious legend about how he gained his initial funding.
Umineko Project (UP): After the war, Grandfather successfully predicted what the future would hold, his big gamble paid off, and he accumulated a vast store of wealth, ......but there is a mysterious legend about how he gained the funds in the first place.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After the war, Grandfather correctly predicted what the future would hold and won in a huge gamble, accumulating a vast store of wealth, ......but there is a mysterious legend about how he gained the funds in the first place.
PC Japanese (JP): 戦後、祖父さまは時代を先読みした大博打に勝ち、莫大な富を築くのだが、……その祖父さまが、最初の資本金をどう築いたか、ということである奇妙な伝説があるのだ。
Russian (RU): После войны дедушке удалось предугадать, чего ожидать в будущем, и, сделав рискованную ставку и сорвав большой куш, накопить огромное состояние. ......Но есть одна мистическая легенда о том, как ему удалось заполучить изначальные фонды для ведения дел.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após a guerra, o vovô, prevendo o que o futuro reservava, e apostando alto, acumulou uma vasta fortuna, ......mas existe uma lenda misteriosa sobre como ele obteve seus fundos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 戰後，爺爺在預判了時代走勢的豪賭中取勝，築就起了巨大財富。……但關於爺爺最開始時的資本是從哪來的，有個奇妙的傳說。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 战后，爷爷在预判了时代走势的豪赌中取胜，筑就起了巨大财富。……但关于爷爷最开始时的资本是从哪来的，有个奇妙的传说。
Indonesian (IDN): Setelah perang, Kakek berhasil memprediksi masa depan, taruhan besarnya terbayar, dan dia mengumpulkan kekayaan besar, ......tapi ada legenda misterius tentang bagaimana dia mendapatkan modal awalnya.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo la guerra, il Nonno predisse il futuro e vinse in un grosso azzardo, accumulando una enorme quantità di beni... ma su come guadagnò il denaro la prima volta, c'è una misteriosa leggenda.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dopo la guerra, il nonno predisse il futuro e vinse una grossa scommessa, accumulando enormi ricchezze... ma c'è una misteriosa leggenda su come ottenne i finanziamenti iniziali.
Turkish (TR): Savaştan sonra Büyükbaba geleceğin ne getireceğini başarıyla tahmin etmiş, oynadığı büyük kumar tutmuş ve büyük bir servet biriktirmişti, ......ancak fonları ilk etapta nasıl elde ettiğine dair gizemli bir efsane var.

Steam (ST): Grandfather came from a branch family and had no connections in the business world or the financial world. Even though he later built connections with the occupying forces, he supposedly started as a nameless person who hadn't yet gained anyone's trust.
Umineko Project (UP): Grandfather came from a branch family and had no connections in the business world or the financial world. Even though he later built connections with the occupying forces, in the beginning he was supposedly a nameless person who had not yet gained anyone's trust.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Grandfather came from the branch family and had no connections in the business world or the financial world. Even though he later built connections with the occupying forces, in the beginning he was supposedly a nameless person who had not yet gained anyone's trust.
PC Japanese (JP): 祖父さまは分家筋から来た人間で、政界にも財界にもコネクションはなく、後に進駐軍に太いコネクションを築くにしても、一番の最初は誰の信頼も得ていない無名の人物だったはずだ。
Russian (RU): Дедушка был отпрыском одной из ветвей семьи Уширомия и не имел никаких связей ни в деловом, ни в финансовом мире. Хотя впоследствии он заручился поддержкой оккупационных сил, изначально он был никому не известным человеком, которому ещё только предстояло завоевать чьё‐либо доверие.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O vovô veio de uma ramificação da família e não tinha conexões com o mundo dos negócios, e nem financeiro. Mesmo assim, ele construiu conexões com as forças de ocupação. No início, ele supostamente era uma pessoa desconhecida, que ainda não tinha ganhado a confiança de ninguém.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 爺爺是從分家來的人，在政界在財界都沒有人脈。雖然後來與進駐軍建立了硬關係，但在最開始的時候，他還只是一個不被任何人信賴的無名小卒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 爷爷是从分家来的人，在政界在财界都没有人脉。虽然后来与进驻军建立了硬关系，但在最开始的时候，他还只是一个不被任何人信赖的无名小卒。
Indonesian (IDN): Kakek berasal dari keluarga cabang dan tidak punya koneksi di dunia bisnis atau keuangan. Meski kemudian membangun hubungan dengan pasukan pendudukan, awalnya dia hanya orang tak dikenal yang belum dipercaya siapa pun.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il Nonno viene da un ramo della famiglia e non ha connessioni con il mondo finanziario o degli affari. Nonostante in seguito fondò rapporti con le forze occupanti, apparentemente all'inizio era uno sconosciuto che ancora non si era guadagnato la fiducia di nessuno.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il nonno veniva da un ramo cadetto, e non aveva connessioni con il mondo politico o degli affari, e anche se in seguito stabilì delle profonde relazioni con le forze occupanti, apparentemente all'inizio era uno sconosciuto che non si era ancora guadagnato la fiducia di nessuno.
Turkish (TR): Büyükbabam işçi bir aileden geliyordu ve iş dünyasında ya da finans dünyasında hiçbir bağlantısı yoktu. Daha sonra işgalci güçlerle bağlantılar kurmuş olsa da, başlangıçta henüz kimsenin güvenini kazanmamış isimsiz bir kişiydi.

Steam (ST): It takes trust to gather money. There's no way anyone would lend money to someone they didn't trust.
Umineko Project (UP): Money can only be gathered based on trust.{n}There's no way anyone would lend money to an untrustworthy person.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Money can only be gathered based on trust. There's no way anyone would lend money to an untrustworthy person.
PC Japanese (JP): カネは信用で集めるものでもある。信用のできない人物にカネを貸す者はありえない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): カネは信用で集めるものでもある。{n}信用のできない人物にカネを貸す者はありえない。
Russian (RU): Деньги же возможно было собрать только на доверительной основе.{n}Никто не стал бы доверять свои деньги незнакомому человеку.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Dinheiro é uma coisa que só pode ser obtida se houver confiança.{n}Não existe ninguém que vá emprestar dinheiro para uma pessoa que não seja confiável.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 錢是靠信用來聚集的。{n}不可能有人會借錢給無法信用的人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 钱是靠信用来聚集的。{n}不可能有人会借钱给无法信用的人。
Indonesian (IDN): Uang hanya bisa dikumpulkan berdasarkan kepercayaan.{n}Tidak mungkin ada yang meminjamkan uang pada orang tidak terpercaya.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il denaro può essere guadagnato solo basandosi sulla fiducia. Non è possibile che qualcuno presti denaro ad una persona non fidata.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il denaro si accumula mediante una reputazione. Non è possibile che qualcuno presti denaro ad uno di cui non può fidarsi...
Turkish (TR): Para ancak güvene dayalı olarak toplanabilir.{n}Kimsenin güvenilmez birine borç para vermesine imkan yoktur.

Umineko Project (UP): ......How did Grandfather, whose trustworthiness was zero, manage to obtain the large amount of funds in the first place?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......How did Grandfather, whose trustworthiness was zero, manage to obtain the large amount of funds in the first place?

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Come ha fatto il nonno, la cui reputazione era pari a zero, ad ottenere in primo luogo un enorme ammontare di fondi?

Steam (ST): Grandfather then went on and on about his continuing research into alchemy and techniques for summoning demons in order to become a great magician.
Umineko Project (UP): He then went on and on about how he continued to research alchemy and techniques for summoning demons in order to become a great mage.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Grandfather then went on and on about how he continued to research alchemy and techniques for summoning demons in order to become a great magician.
PC Japanese (JP): 祖父さまは偉大なる魔術師で、錬金術、悪魔召喚の術を研究し続けていて云々かんぬん。
Russian (RU): После чего он пустился в рассказы о том, как он изучал алхимию и способы вызова демонов, чтобы стать великим магом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E desde então ele tem continuado a pesquisar sobre alquimia e técnicas para invocar demônios para poder se tornar um grande mago.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 據說，爺爺是偉大的魔術師，一直都在研究著鍊金術、惡魔召喚術什麼的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 据说，爷爷是伟大的魔术师，一直都在研究着炼金术、恶魔召唤术什么的。
Indonesian (IDN): Lalu dia terus bercerita tentang bagaimana dia meneliti alkimia dan ritual pemanggilan iblis untuk menjadi penyihir besar.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il Nonno continua a parlare di come ha continuato la ricerca sull'alchimia e le tecniche per evocare i demoni per diventare un grande mago.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il nonno era un grande mago, che studiava da tempo le tecniche dell'alchimia, dell'evocazione dei demoni e così via...
Turkish (TR): Daha sonra, büyük bir büyücü olmak için simya ve iblis çağırma tekniklerini nasıl araştırmaya devam ettiğini anlatıyor.

Steam (ST): ...And the entity summoned as the result of the demon-calling ceremony...was the Golden Witch {f:5:Beatrice}.
Umineko Project (UP): ...And the entity summoned as the result of the demon‐calling ritual was the Golden Witch {f:5:Beatrice}.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...And the entity summoned as the result of the demon-calling ceremony was the Golden Witch Beatrice.
PC Japanese (JP): …そして、悪魔を呼び出す儀式の果てに召喚したのが、黄金の魔女ベアトリーチェなのだという。
Russian (RU): ...И сущностью, ответившей на призыв демона, оказалась Золотая Ведьма {f:5:Беатриче}.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...E a entidade que ele invocou, como resultado de um de seus experimentos, foi a Bruxa Dourada, {f:5:Beatrice}.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …而在一次召喚惡魔的儀式中召喚出來的，就是黃金的魔女貝阿朵莉切。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …而在一次召唤恶魔的仪式中召唤出来的，就是黄金的魔女贝阿朵莉切。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Dan entitas yang dipanggil dalam ritual itu adalah Penyihir Emas {f:5:Beatrice}.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... E l'entità evocata come risultato della cerimonia evocatrice di demoni fu la Strega Dorata Beatrice.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E la Strega Dorata {f:5:Beatrice} fu la creatura invocata al termine del suo rituale di evocazione demoniaca.
Turkish (TR): ...Ve iblis çağırma ritüeli sonucunda çağrılan varlık Altın Cadı {f:5:Beatrice}.

Steam (ST): He then apparently made a contract by which he would receive fortune and honor in exchange for his own soul.
Umineko Project (UP): He then said that he made a contract where, in exchange for his own soul, he would receive fortune and honor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He then said that he made a contract where, in exchange for his own soul, he would receive fortune and honor.
PC Japanese (JP): そして祖父さまは己の魂と引き換えに、ベアトリーチェに富と名誉を授けるよう契約したというのだ。
Russian (RU): Тогда он сказал, что заключил контракт, согласно которому в обмен на свою душу он получит богатство и репутацию.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele disse que fez um contrato com ela e que, em troca de sua alma, ele receberia honra e uma grande fortuna.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 之後爺爺以自己的靈魂為代價，和貝阿朵莉切簽下了授予名譽和財富的契約。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 之后爷爷以自己的灵魂为代价，和贝阿朵莉切签下了授予名誉和财富的契约。
Indonesian (IDN): Dia lalu membuat kontrak dimana, sebagai ganti jiwanya, dia akan menerima kekayaan dan kehormatan.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ha poi detto che strinse un patto dove, in cambio della propria anima, avrebbe ricevuto onore e fortuna.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): In seguito si dice che il nonno stipulò un contratto con Beatrice, in cui ottenne fama e ricchezze in cambio della propria anima.
Turkish (TR): Daha sonra, kendi ruhu karşılığında servet ve onur alacağı bir sözleşme yaptığını söyledi.

Steam (ST): The witch then granted Grandfather 10 tons of gold.
Umineko Project (UP): The witch then granted Grandfather ten tons of gold.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The witch then granted Grandfather 10 tons of gold.
PC Japanese (JP): 魔女は、祖父さまに１０ｔの黄金を与えたという。
Russian (RU): После этого ведьма предоставила дедушке 10 тонн золота.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A bruxa então garantiu a ele dez toneladas de ouro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 魔女賜予了爺爺十吨黃金。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 魔女赐予了爷爷十吨黄金。
Indonesian (IDN): Penyihir itu kemudian memberi Kakek sepuluh ton emas.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La strega concesse quindi al Nonno 10 tonnellate d'oro.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Pare che la strega cedette al nonno dieci tonnellate d'oro.
Turkish (TR): Cadı da daha sonra Büyükbabaya on ton altın verdi.

Steam (ST): Grandfather used this gold as collateral to prepare a vast quantity of funds, which he then used to multiply his wealth many times over and revive the Ushiromiya family...
Umineko Project (UP): Grandfather used this gold as collateral to prepare a vast quantity of funds, and then used that to multiply his wealth by several times and revive the Ushiromiya family...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Grandfather used this gold as collateral to prepare a vast quantity of funds, and then used that to multiply his wealth by several times and revive the Ushiromiya family...
PC Japanese (JP): 祖父さまはその黄金を担保に莫大な資金を用意し、さらにそれを元手に何倍にも増やし、右代宮家を復興させたというのだ…。
Russian (RU): Дедушка использовал это золото в качестве залога для привлечения огромных денежных средств, и затем, воспользовавшись ими, в несколько раз увеличил своё состояние, возродив семью Уширомия...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele usou esse ouro como garantia para preparar uma grande quantidade de fundos, e para multiplicar sua fortuna e reviver a família Ushiromiya...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他就以這黃金為抵押而得到了巨額的資金，後來又把這筆本金翻了幾倍，從而讓右代宮家得以復興…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他就以这黄金为抵押而得到了巨额的资金，后来又把这笔本金翻了几倍，从而让右代宫家得以复兴…。
Indonesian (IDN): Kakek menggunakan emas ini sebagai jaminan untuk menyiapkan dana besar, lalu menggunakannya untuk melipatgandakan kekayaannya dan menghidupkan kembali keluarga Ushiromiya...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il Nonno usò questo oro come garanzia per preparare una enorme quantità di fondi, e quindi lo usò per moltiplicare il suo patrimonio più volte e far rivivere la famiglia Ushiromiya...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il nonno usò questo oro come garanzia per procurarsi un'enorme quantità di fondi, e così incrementò ulteriormente i suoi capitali, permettendogli di risollevare la famiglia Ushiromiya...
Turkish (TR): Büyükbaba bu altını büyük miktarda fon hazırlamak için teminat olarak kullandı, sonra da bunu servetini birkaç katına çıkarmak ve Ushiromiya ailesini yeniden canlandırmak için kullandı...

Steam (ST): It seems this story's so old that even our parents were told it when they were still children.
Umineko Project (UP): It seems that this story is so old that our parents had already been told it when they were still children.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It seems that this story was so old that our parents had already been told it when they were still children.
PC Japanese (JP): この辺の話は、親たちが子供の頃からすでに聞かされている相当古い話らしい。
Russian (RU): Похоже, что эта история так стара, что нашим родителям её рассказывали, ещё когда они были детьми.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Parece que essa história é tão velha que nossos pais já tinham nos contado quando ainda éramos pequenos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這些話我爸他們小時候就聽人講過，看起來是很久以前就有了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这些话我爸他们小时候就听人讲过，看起来是很久以前就有了。
Indonesian (IDN): Cerita ini sudah sangat tua sampai orang tua kami pun sudah mendengarnya saat masih kecil.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sembra che questa storia sia così vecchia che è stata già raccontata ai nostri genitori quando loro erano ancora dei bambini.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Pare che questa storia fosse così vecchia, che i nostri genitori l'avevano già sentita quando erano ancora dei bambini.
Turkish (TR): Görünüşe göre bu hikaye o kadar eski ki anne ve babamıza daha çocukken anlatılmış.

Steam (ST): So, back when our parents were young, they explored this island in all sorts of ways, believing that the gold Grandfather had received from the witch might be hidden somewhere.
Umineko Project (UP): So, our parents, when they were little, explored this island in various ways, believing that the gold that Grandfather had received from the witch might be hidden somewhere.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Therefore, while our parents were still young, they explored this island in various ways, believing that the gold that Grandfather had received from the witch might be hidden somewhere.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、親たちも小さい頃には、祖父さまが魔女より得たという黄金がこの島のどこかに隠してあるのではないかと信じて、色々と探検をしたりしたらしい。
Russian (RU): Поэтому, когда наши родители были ещё молоды, они разными путями исследовали этот остров, считая, что золото, которое дедушка получил от ведьмы, спрятано где‐то неподалёку.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, nossos pais, quando eram crianças, exploraram esta ilha de todas as formas, acreditando que o ouro que o nosso avô havia recebido da bruxa, estava escondido em algum lugar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以我爸他們小的時候，好像很相信爺爺從魔女那得到的黃金，沒准就藏在這個島上，還進行過多次探險。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以我爸他们小的时候，好像很相信爷爷从魔女那得到的黄金，没准就藏在这个岛上，还进行过多次探险。
Indonesian (IDN): Jadi orang tua kami, saat kecil, menjelajahi pulau ini mencari-cari, percaya bahwa emas dari penyihir itu mungkin tersembunyi di suatu tempat.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Pertanto, quando i nostri genitori erano ancora giovani, esplorarono quest'isola in molti modi, credendo che l'oro che il Nonno ricevette dalla Strega potesse essere nascosto da qualche parte.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Pertanto, i nostri genitori da piccoli esplorarono l'isola in lungo e in largo,credendo che da qualche parte si celasse l'oro che il nonno aveva ricevuto dalla strega.
Turkish (TR): Yani ailelerimiz küçükken, Büyükbabanın cadıdan aldığı altınların bir yerlerde saklı olabileceğine inanarak bu adayı çeşitli şekillerde araştırdılar.

Steam (ST): However, since there was the danger of them getting lost in the abandoned forest, Grandmother began to spread the story that the witch lived in the forest and approaching it was forbidden.
Umineko Project (UP): However, since there was the danger of them getting lost in the abandoned forest, Grandmother or someone began to spread the story that the witch lived in the forest and approaching it was too dangerous...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, since there was the danger of them getting lost in the abandoned forest, Grandmother began to spread the story that the witch lived in the forest and that approaching it was forbidden.
PC Japanese (JP): だが、無人の森に入って迷子になったりして危なかったため、祖母さま辺りが、森には魔女が住んでいるから危ない、近寄ってはいけない、というような話を吹き込んだんだとか…。
Russian (RU): Однако поскольку существовала угроза, что они могут потеряться в диком лесу, бабушка придумала историю о том, будто в лесу живёт ведьма, а потому ходить туда запрещено.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, por causa do perigo de acabar se perdendo na floresta, nossa avó ou outra pessoa, começou a espalhar a história de que a bruxa vivia na floresta e era perigoso se aproximar dela...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，在無人的森林中迷路是很危險的。因此奶奶他們就告訴我爸那几兄妹，說什麼森林中住著魔女因此十分危險，不可以接近之類的…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，在无人的森林中迷路是很危险的。因此奶奶他们就告诉我爸那几兄妹，说什么森林中住着魔女因此十分危险，不可以接近之类的…。
Indonesian (IDN): Tapi karena bahaya tersesat di hutan terlantar, Nenek atau seseorang mulai menyebarkan cerita bahwa penyihir tinggal di hutan dan mendekatinya terlalu berbahaya...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Comunque, quando cominciarono a fare cose pericolose come entrare nella foresta abbandonata e perdersi, la Nonna cominciò a spargere la voce che la strega vivesse nella foresta e che avvicinarvisi fosse proibito.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Tuttavia, poiché c'era il rischio che si perdessero, una volta entrati nella foresta selvaggia, la nonna cominciò a spargere la voce che fosse pericoloso perché nella foresta viveva una strega, e che era proibito avvicinarvisi.
Turkish (TR): Ancak, balta girmemiş ormanda kaybolma tehlikesi de vardı, Büyükanne ya da birileri cadının ormanda yaşadığı ve oraya yaklaşmanın çok tehlikeli olduğu hikayesini yaymaya başladı...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "...I remember that old story. When we were little, we also went all over the island searching for treasure after our parents told us about it. ......Didn't we get lost in the forest once, then start crying until some of the servants found us? Our parents got so mad. ...Dang, that takes me back."
Umineko Project (UP): "......I remember that old story. When we were little, our parents told us about it and we went all over the island searching for treasure. .........Didn't we get lost in the forest and start crying until some of the servants found us? Our parents were so mad at us. ...That takes me back."

When we were little, our parents told us about it and we went all over the island searching for treasure. ......Didn't we get lost in the forest and start crying until some of the servants found us? Our parents were so mad at us. ...How nostalgic."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……そんな話があったなぁ。俺たちも小さい頃、親からその話を聞かされて、宝探しと称して島中あちこちうろうろして、………森で迷ってわんわん泣いて、使用人さんに見つけてもらって親に滅茶苦茶怒られたんじゃなかったっけ。…なーつかしぃぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……そんな話があったなぁ。俺たちも小さい頃、親からその話を聞かされて、宝探しと称して島中あちこちうろうろして、………森で迷ってわんわん泣いて、使用人さんに見つけてもらって親に滅茶苦茶怒られたんじゃなかったっけ。…なーつかしぃぜ」
Russian (RU): "...Я помню эту старую историю. Когда мы были маленькими, наши родители рассказывали нам об этом, и мы потом бродили по всему острову в поисках сокровищ. ......Потом мы, кажется, потерялись в лесу и плакали, пока кто‐то из слуг нас не нашёл? Наши родители так на нас разозлились. ...Какая ностальгия."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Eu me lembro dessa velha história. Quando nós éramos menores, nossos pais nos contaram sobre isso e nós começamos a vasculhar pela ilha atrás do tesouro. .........Nós não chegamos a nos perder na floresta e começamos a chorar até que um dos serviçais nos encontrou? Nossos pais ficaram muito bravos.{n}...Isso me traz lembranças."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……說起來是有這麼回事啊。小時候聽爸媽說過這些之後，我們也為了尋寶在島上到處轉來轉去，………然後在森林裡迷了路哇哇地哭，到後來被傭人找到，回去後還被長輩們罵了個底兒朝天來著吧。…還挺懷念的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……说起来是有这么回事啊。小时候听爸妈说过这些之后，我们也为了寻宝在岛上到处转来转去，………然后在森林里迷了路哇哇地哭，到后来被佣人找到，回去后还被长辈们骂了个底儿朝天来着吧。…还挺怀念的。」
Indonesian (IDN): "......Aku ingat cerita lama itu. Saat kita kecil, orang tua bercerita dan kita mencari harta karun di seluruh pulau. .........Bukankah kita pernah tersesat di hutan dan menangis sampai para pelayan menemukan kita? Orang tua sangat marah. ...Mengenang masa lalu."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Ricordo questa vecchia storia. Quando eravamo piccoli, i nostri genitori ce la raccontarono e noi girammo per tutta l'isola cercando il tesoro. ... Non eravamo proprio noi che ci siamo persi e abbiamo iniziato a piangere fino a quando qualcuno dei servitori ci ha trovato? I nostri genitori si arrabbiarono così tanto. ... Che nostalgia."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Ricordo una storia simile. I nostri genitori ce la raccontarono quando eravamo piccoli, e noi vagavamo di qua e di là per l'isola mentre fingevamo una caccia al tesoro... Se non sbaglio, una volta ci perdemmo nella foresta e piangemmo come dei lattanti, poi un domestico ci ritrovò e i nostri genitori diedero di matto, vero?Ah, bei tempi."
Turkish (TR): "......Bu eski hikayeyi hatırlıyorum. Küçükken ailelerimiz bize anlatırdı ve biz de adanın her yerine hazine aramaya giderdik. .........Ormanda kaybolup hizmetkârlardan biri bizi bulana kadar ağlamamış mıydık? Ailelerimiz bize çok kızmıştı. ...Bu beni geçmişe götürdü."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): "We sure were idiots, weren't we? After all, Grandfather only bought this island after using those funds to get rich, right? That means he must've had the gold before coming here. There's no way the gold's on this island."
Umineko Project (UP): "We sure were idiots, weren't we? I mean, come on, Grandfather used that to build up the funds that he finally bought this island with, right? That means he must have had the gold before coming here. There's no way it'd be here on the island."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "We sure were idiots, weren't we? After all, Grandfather used that to build up the funds that he finally bought this island with, right? That means he must have had the gold before coming to this island. There's no reason the gold itself should be on the island."
PC Japanese (JP): 「バカだったよなぁ。だってよぅ、祖父さまはその資本金で儲けた挙句でこの島を買うんだぜ？　この島に来る前から黄金を持ってたってことになるじゃねぇか。この島にあるわけがないぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「バカだったよなぁ。だってよぅ、祖父さまはその資本金で儲けた挙句でこの島を買うんだぜ？　この島に来る前から黄金を持ってたってことになるじゃねぇか。この島にあるわけがないぜ」
Russian (RU): "Ну и дураками же мы были тогда, верно? Ведь, в конце концов, дедушка уже и так имел деньги, когда он приобрёл этот остров, не так ли? Значит, золото у него должно было быть ещё до приезда на этот остров. Нет никаких оснований полагать, будто золото находится на острове."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Nós éramos mesmo idiotas, não éramos? Quero dizer, o vovô usou os fundos que tinha conseguido para poder comprar essa ilha, certo? O que significa que ele já tinha o ouro antes de vir pra cá. Não tem como ele estar nessa ilha."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那時候真是笨啊。畢竟啊，爺爺他可是靠那資本賺了大錢後才買的這個島嘞！這不就是說在來這島前就已經有那筆黃金了嘛。不可能在這個島嘞。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那时候真是笨啊。毕竟啊，爷爷他可是靠那资本赚了大钱后才买的这个岛嘞！这不就是说在来这岛前就已经有那笔黄金了嘛。不可能在这个岛嘞。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Kita memang bodoh, ya? Maksudku, Kakek menggunakan itu untuk membangun dana yang akhirnya dipakai membeli pulau ini, kan? Artinya emas itu pasti sudah ada sebelum datang ke sini. Tidak mungkin ada di pulau ini."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Eravamo davvero idioti, eh? Dopotutto, il Nonno lo usò per aumentare i fondi con cui alla fine comprò quest'isola, giusto? Questo vuol dire che lui deve aver avuto l'oro prima di venire sull'isola. Non c'è motivo per cui l'oro stesso dovrebbe essere sull'isola."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Che scemi che eravamo. Dopotutto, il nonno comprò quest'isola solo dopo aver tratto i profitti del suo capitale azionario, giusto? Questo vuol dire che lui doveva avere l'oro prima di arrivare sull'isola. Non c'è motivo per cui l'oro debba essere qui."
Turkish (TR): "Ne kadar da aptalmışız, değil mi? Yani, hadi ama, Büyükbabam o parayla işin sonunda bu adayı satın aldı, değil mi? Demek ki buraya gelmeden önce altını vardı. Altının burada, adada olmasına imkan yok."

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): "That's not necessarily so. Maybe the gold was hidden on the island from the beginning...and he bought the whole island just to ensure that it'd be his and his alone. There was a whole 10 metric tons of it, right? It seems more realistic that he'd try to secure the place where it was hidden, rather than try to move it all."
Umineko Project (UP): "......That's not necessarily so. Maybe the gold was hidden on the island from the beginning and he bought the whole island just to make sure it was all his. There was a whole ten tons of it, right? It seems more realistic that he would try to secure the place where it was hidden rather than try to move it all."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That's not necessarily so. Maybe the gold was hidden on the island from the beginning and he bought the whole island just to make sure it was all his. There was a whole 10 tons of it, right? It seems more realistic that he would try to secure the place where it was hidden rather than try to move it all."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……そうとも限らないよ。その黄金が、元からこの島に隠されていて、それを確実に自分のものにするために、この島を丸々買い取ったとかね。何しろ１０ｔもあるんだもん。安全な場所に移すより、隠し場所そのものを確保する方が現実的だよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……そうとも限らないよ。その黄金が、元からこの島に隠されていて、それを確実に自分のものにするために、この島を丸々買い取ったとかね。何しろ１０ｔもあるんだもん。安全な場所に移すより、隠し場所そのものを確保する方が現実的だよ」
Russian (RU): "Это не совсем так. Возможно, всё золото было спрятано на острове с самого начала, и он выкупил весь остров просто для того, чтобы окончательно завладеть им. Всего ведь было 10 тонн, верно? Более правдоподобней была бы версия, что он попытался застолбить место, где оно хранится, чем перемещать его сюда."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Não exatamente. Talvez o ouro já estivesse escondido nesta ilha desde o início e ele comprou toda a ilha para se certificar de que seria todo seu. São cerca de dez toneladas, certo? É mais realista pensar que ele tentou proteger o lugar no qual ele estava escondido do que mover tudo para outro lugar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……這可不一定。沒准這筆黃金一開始就藏在這個島上，爺爺是為了讓它確確實實地成為自己的東西，才把這整個島買下來的。畢竟這可是有十吨啊。與其轉移到其他安全的地方，還是先把藏黃金的地方保住要來得現實。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……这可不一定。没准这笔黄金一开始就藏在这个岛上，爷爷是为了让它确确实实地成为自己的东西，才把这整个岛买下来的。毕竟这可是有十吨啊。与其转移到其他安全的地方，还是先把藏黄金的地方保住要来得现实。」
Indonesian (IDN): "......Tidak selalu begitu. Mungkin emasnya disembunyikan di pulau dari awal dan dia membeli seluruh pulau untuk memastikannya miliknya. Katanya sepuluh ton, kan? Lebih realistis mengamankan tempat persembunyiannya daripada memindahkan semuanya."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non è necessariamente così. Forse l'oro era nascosto sull'isola dall'inizio e lui comprò l'intera isola solo per essere sicuro che fosse tutto suo. In tutto erano 10 tonnellate, giusto? Sembra più realistico che volesse provare ad assicurarsi il luogo dove era nascosto piuttosto che provare a muoverlo tutto."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Non è detto che le cose stiano in questo modo. Forse l'oro era nascosto qui sin dall'inizio, e lui acquistò l'intera isola solo per assicurarsi che sarebbe stato nelle sue mani. In tutto erano dieci tonnellate, vero? È più plausibile che volesse mettere in sicurezza il nascondiglio, piuttosto che cambiare il luogo in cui era custodito."
Turkish (TR): "......Böyle olması şart değil. Belki de altın en başından beri adada saklıydı ve sırf kendisine ait olduğundan emin olmak için tüm adayı satın aldı. On ton altın vardı, değil mi? Hepsini taşımaya çalışmak yerine onları sakladığı yeri güvenceye almaya çalışması daha gerçekçi görünüyor."

Umineko Project (UP): "This epitaph was written two years ago. And since Grandfather had it written himself... ......I see, this does make the Legend of the Gold more believable."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「この碑文を書かせたのは２年前。それも祖父さま自身ってなると、……なるほど、黄金伝説も信憑性が増してくるじゃねぇか」

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这碑文是两年前写上的。还是爷爷自己命人写的。……原来如此，黄金传说的可信度更高了啊。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Epitaf ini ditulis dua tahun lalu. Dan karena Kakek sendiri yang menyuruh buat... ......Aku mengerti, ini membuat Legenda Emas lebih bisa dipercaya."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Questa iscrizione è stata scritta due anni fa. E dal Nonno stesso... capisco, questo fa diventare la Leggenda dell'Oro ancora più credibile.

Turkish (TR): "Bu kitabe iki yıl önce yazılmış. Ve Büyükbabam bunu kendisi yazdığı için... ......Anlıyorum, bu Altın Efsanesi'ni daha inandırıcı kılıyor."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): The so-called witch's gold that revived the Ushiromiya family weighed 10 tons. ......Maybe that's sleeping somewhere, ready to be turned over to whoever can solve Grandfather's riddle. Maybe that's why he did it.
Umineko Project (UP): "Ten tons of gold, bestowed upon Grandfather by a witch, that it's said he used to revive the Ushiromiya family. ......It's sleeping somewhere even now, and Grandfather may be planning to turn it over to whoever can solve his riddle."

Você também precisa pagar uma comissão para transformá‐lo em dinheiro. Steam (ST): It was a play on words. Of course the others, who were forcing Krauss to pay money for some nonexistent gold, wouldn't save Krauss his portion if they actually found it.
Umineko Project (UP): Insignificant details. The others, who were forcing Krauss to pay money for some nonexistent gold, would of course not ensure Krauss's portion if they actually found the gold.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was a play on words. The others, who were forcing Krauss to pay money for some nonexistent gold, would of course not ensure Krauss's portion if they actually found the gold.
PC Japanese (JP): 詭弁だ。存在しない黄金にカネを払わせた彼らが、仮に本当に黄金を見つけたとして、蔵臼に取り分を保証するわけなどない。
Russian (RU): Это была игра слов. Его брат и сёстры, стремящиеся вынудить его заплатить им деньги за несуществующее золото, ни за что не стали бы делиться с Крауссом, случись кому‐нибудь из них действительно отыскать золото.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Detalhes insignificantes. Os outros, que estavam forçando Krauss a pagar o dinheiro por um ouro imaginário, é claro que não garantiriam a porção do Krauss se ele realmente fosse encontrado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是在睜眼說瞎話。為了根本不存在的黃金讓大哥付錢的他們，就算真的找到了黃金，也不可能會留著藏臼那份。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是在睁眼说瞎话。为了根本不存在的黄金让大哥付钱的他们，就算真的找到了黄金，也不可能会留着藏臼那份。
Indonesian (IDN): Detail sepele. Mereka yang memaksa Krauss membayar untuk emas tidak ada, tentu tidak akan menyerahkan emas jika benar-benar menemukannya.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era un gioco di parole. Gli altri che stavano obbligando Krauss a pagare denaro per dell'oro inesistente, non si sarebbero, ovviamente, assicurati la parte di Krauss se avessero veramente trovato l'oro.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Stava giocando con le parole. Loro gli stavano facendo pagare in denaro per dell'oro che non esisteva, e anche se avessero veramente trovato l'oro, non c'era motivo per cui avrebbero garantito la quota di Klaus.
Turkish (TR): Bunlar kelime oyunlarıydı. Krauss'u var olmayan bir altın için para ödemeye zorlayan diğerleri, altını gerçekten bulmaları halinde elbette Krauss'un payını sağlamayacaklardı.

Umineko Project (UP): While the truth might be different, the probability that Krauss was embezzling his father's assets was extremely high.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): While the truth might be different, the possibility that Krauss was embezzling his father's assets was extremely high.
PC Japanese (JP): 事実がどうかは別にして、蔵臼が父親の財産を横領している可能性は極めて高い。
Russian (RU): Хотя правда и могла быть иной, вероятность того, что Краусс растрачивал имущество отца, была очень высокой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Embora a verdade possa ser completamente diferente, a probabilidade de que Krauss estava desviando os fundos de seu pai era extremamente alta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 事實如何先不管，藏臼在盜用父親財產的可能性是極高的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 事实如何先不管，藏臼在盗用父亲财产的可能性是极高的。
Indonesian (IDN): Meski mungkin berbeda, kemungkinan Krauss menggelapkan aset ayahnya sangat tinggi.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): A prescindere dalla realtà dei fatti, le probabilità che Klaus si fosse appropriato indebitamente dei beni del padre erano estremamente alte.
Turkish (TR): Gerçek farklı olsa da, Krauss'un babasının mal varlığını zimmetine geçirmiş olma ihtimali son derece yüksekti.

Steam (ST): When Kinzo faced death at last and had his inheritance distributed, some unpleasant facts would surely come to light.
Umineko Project (UP): When at last Kinzo faced death and it came time for the inheritance to be distributed, surely some unpleasant facts would come to light.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When at last Kinzo faced death and the inheritance would be distributed, surely some unpleasant facts would be established.
PC Japanese (JP): やがて訪れる金蔵の死去に際して、遺産分配となれば、必ずや不明朗な事実が判明するだろう。
Russian (RU): Теперь, когда смерть Кинзо была уже не за горами, и на горизонте замаячила перспектива дележа наследства, на свет могли выползти довольно неприятные факты.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando Kinzo finalmente se encontrar com a morte e a hora da distribuição da herança chegar, certamente alguns fatos desagradáveis vão vir à tona.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不久之後金藏去世，開始分配遺產的時候，必然會發現些對藏臼不利的事實吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不久之后金藏去世，开始分配遗产的时候，必然会发现些对藏臼不利的事实吧。
Indonesian (IDN): Saat Kinzo akhirnya meninggal dan warisan dibagi, fakta tidak menyenangkan pasti terungkap.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando alla fine Kinzo avrebbe affrontato la morte e l'eredità sarebbe dovuta essere distribuita, sicuramente certi fatti spiacevoli sarebbero venuti alla luce.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Una volta che la morte di Kinzo sarebbe finalmente giunta, e sarebbe iniziata la spartizione dell'eredità, ogni evento controverso sarebbe senz'altro venuto alla luce.
Turkish (TR): Sonunda Kinzo ölümle yüzleştiğinde ve mirasın dağıtılma zamanı geldiğinde, kesinlikle bazı tatsız gerçekler ortaya çıkacaktı.

Steam (ST): That could easily become fatal to Krauss.
Umineko Project (UP): That situation would likely be a fatal wound to Krauss.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That situation would likely be a fatal wound to Krauss.
PC Japanese (JP): それは蔵臼にとって致命傷となりかねない事態だ。
Russian (RU): Подобный расклад мог стать для Краусса фатальным.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Essa situação seria como uma ferida fatal para Krauss.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這對藏臼來說，是可能成為致命傷的最糟狀況。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这对藏臼来说，是可能成为致命伤的最糟状况。
Indonesian (IDN): Situasi itu akan menjadi pukulan telak bagi Krauss.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quell'eventualità sarebbe stata una ferita mortale per Krauss.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Una circostanza che si rivelerebbe fatale per Klaus.
Turkish (TR): Bu durum muhtemelen Krauss için ölümcül bir darbe olacaktı.

Steam (ST): The others had spotted this weak point and were threatening their brother under the veil of compromise, trying to wring a huge sum of money out of him.
Umineko Project (UP): They had latched onto that weak point, and were threatening their brother under the veil of compromise, trying to wring out a huge sum of money.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They had snatched up that weak point and, under the veil of compromise, were threatening their brother to try and wring out a huge sum of money.
PC Japanese (JP): その弱点を彼らは掴み切り、譲歩するふりをしながら兄を脅迫して莫大なカネを搾り出そうとしているのだ。
Russian (RU): Они вычислили это слабое место и, прикрывшись маской компромисса, угрожали своему брату вынуть и положить огромную сумму денег.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles haviam se agarrado a este ponto fraco, e ameaçado seu irmão sobre o véu deste compromisso, tentando arrancar dele uma grande quantidade de dinheiro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他們緊緊抓住這個弱點，一邊裝出讓步的樣子，一邊脅迫大哥，想從他身上詐取一大筆錢。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他们紧紧抓住这个弱点，一边装出让步的样子，一边胁迫大哥，想从他身上诈取一大笔钱。
Indonesian (IDN): Mereka mengeksploitasi kelemahan itu, mengancam kakak mereka dengan dalih kompromi, mencoba mengeruk uang dalam jumlah besar.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Loro avevano colto quel punto debole e, sotto il velo del compromesso, stavano ricattando loro fratello per provare ad estorcergli una grande somma di denaro.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Loro avevano colto quel punto debole, e sotto il velo del compromesso, stavano ricattando loro fratello per cercare di estorcergli una grande somma di denaro...
Turkish (TR): {n}Bu zayıf noktayı yakalamışlardı ve uzlaşma perdesi altında kardeşlerini tehdit ederek büyük miktarda para koparmaya çalışıyorlardı.

Steam (ST): ......However, they had forgotten one thing. They'd forgotten that their brother's brain moved so swiftly, at least when it came to cunning and guile, that they'd been forced to band together to combat him.
Umineko Project (UP): ......However, they had let one thing slip their minds.{n}The three of them had forgotten that their oldest sibling, who they couldn't defeat unless they banded together, was a very nimble thinker when it came to being crafty.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......However, they had let one thing slip. The three of them had forgotten that their oldest sibling, who they couldn't defeat unless they banded together, was very crafty and had a swiftly spinning brain.
PC Japanese (JP): ……だが、彼らは失念していた。彼らが３人で連帯しなければ勝てないと思わしめた長兄の、悪知恵に限って回転の速い頭を忘れていたのだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……だが、彼らは失念していた。{n}彼らが３人で連帯しなければ勝てないと思わしめた長兄の、悪知恵に限って回転の速い頭を忘れていたのだ。
Russian (RU): ......Однако кое‐что они всё‐таки упустили.{n}Эта троица забыла, что их старший брат, с которым они могли тягаться лишь выступив единым фронтом, был очень изворотливым и быстро соображал.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......No entanto, eles esqueceram de um detalhe.{n}Os três haviam esquecido que o irmão mais velho, que eles nunca poderiam derrotar sozinhos, era um pensador muito ágil e astuto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……不過，他們忘了一件事。{n}忘了他們三個不聯合起來就無法戰勝的長兄，在想壞主意的時候，腦筋動得那是比誰都快。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……不过，他们忘了一件事。{n}忘了他们三个不联合起来就无法战胜的长兄，在想坏主意的时候，脑筋动得那是比谁都快。
Indonesian (IDN): ......Tapi mereka lupa satu hal.{n}Tiga orang ini lupa bahwa kakak sulung mereka, yang hanya bisa mereka kalahkan jika bersatu, adalah pemikir yang sangat lihai dalam hal kelicikan.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Tuttavia, avevano commesso un lieve errore. Loro tre avevano dimenticato che il loro fratello maggiore, che non avrebbero potuto battere a meno che non si fossero uniti, era molto astuto e di mente sveglia.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Tuttavia, si erano scordati di un dettaglio. I tre avevano dimenticato che loro fratello, per cui pensavano di poterlo battere con l'unione delle loro forze, in termini di scaltrezza possedeva un'incredibile arguzia.
Turkish (TR): ......Ancak, bir şeyi kaçırmışlardı.{n}Üçü de, bir araya gelmedikleri sürece yenemeyecekleri en büyük kardeşlerinin kurnazlık konusunda çok kıvrak bir zekâya sahip olduğunu unutmuşlardı.

Steam (ST): While Eva couldn't stop smiling, sure of her victory, Krauss let out a gloating laugh to show how relaxed he was.
Umineko Project (UP): Krauss relaxedly let out a gloating laugh as he spoke to Eva, who could not hide her smile, so certain she was of her victory.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Krauss, noticing that Eva, sure of her victory, could not hide her smile, relaxedly let out a gloating laugh as he spoke.
PC Japanese (JP): 勝利を確信して笑みを絶やさない絵羽に、蔵臼はリラックスを示して見せると小気味よく笑いながら言った。
Russian (RU): Краусс, заметивший, что Ева уверилась в своей победе, не смог сдержать улыбку, и, злорадно посмеиваясь, заговорил.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Krauss relaxadamente deixou um alegre riso escapar enquanto Eva falava, sem conseguir esconder seu sorriso, certa de sua vitória.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 藏臼對著確信自己已經勝利而笑個不停的繪羽，從容不迫地露出心情愉快的笑容說道。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 藏臼对着确信自己已经胜利而笑个不停的绘羽，从容不迫地露出心情愉快的笑容说道。
Indonesian (IDN): Krauss dengan santai tertawa puas sambil berbicara pada Eva yang tidak bisa menyembunyikan senyum kemenangannya.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Krauss, notando che Eva, sicura della sua vittoria, non era riuscita a nascondere il suo sorriso, come parlò lasciò andare una risata maligna con disinvoltura.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Notando che Eva, sicura della sua vittoria, non riusciva a nascondere il suo sorriso, Klaus si lasciò sfuggire con disinvoltura una risata maligna.
Turkish (TR): Krauss, zaferinden o kadar emindi ki gülümsemesini gizleyemeyen Eva'yla konuşurken rahat bir kahkaha attı.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "Hahaha. This all makes for such a touching story. ...My estrangement from you all has left a deep pain in my heart. If accepting these conditions means we siblings can become friends again, it would please me to no end.
Umineko Project (UP): "Hahaha. This all sounds marvellous to me. ......I had been feeling a deep pain in my heart at my estrangement from the rest of you. If by accepting these conditions, I could make our sibling relationship friendly once again, I would be quite pleased."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Hahaha. Isn't that a great story? ...I also have felt a deep pain in my heart at my estrangement from the rest of you. If by accepting these conditions, the relationship between the siblings could once again become friendly, I would be quite pleased.
PC Japanese (JP): 「はっはっは。とても良い話じゃないか。……私も、お前たちとの関係が疎遠になっていたことには非常に心を痛めていた。この条件を飲むことによって、兄弟間の関係が再び友好なものにできるなら、それはとても嬉しいことだよ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「はっはっは。とても良い話じゃないか。……私も、お前たちとの関係が疎遠になっていたことには非常に心を痛めていた。この条件をのむことによって、兄弟間の関係が再び友好なものにできるなら、それはとても嬉しいことだよ」
Russian (RU): "Ха‐ха‐ха. Какой трогательный рассказ. ...У меня тоже сердце кровью обливалось из‐за отчуждения между нами. Если принятие мною данных условий поможет вернуть тепло в наши отношения, я буду только рад."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Hahaha. Isso tudo parece maravilhoso para mim. ......Eu já tinha sentido uma profunda dor em meu coração ao me distanciar de vocês. Se, aceitando essas condições, eu posso tornar a nossa relação de irmãos mais amigável, eu ficaria muito contente."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「哈哈哈。這可真是件好事啊。……我也對和你們變得關係疏遠而感到非常心痛啊。要是答應了這些條件，就能使我們兄妹間變得和睦友好的話，那我是會非常高興的啊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「哈哈哈。这可真是件好事啊。……我也对和你们变得关系疏远而感到非常心痛啊。要是答应了这些条件，就能使我们兄妹间变得和睦友好的话，那我是会非常高兴的啊。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Hahaha. Ini semua terdengar luar biasa bagiku. ......Aku sudah lama merasa sedih karena jarak dengan kalian. Jika dengan menerima syarat ini hubungan kita bisa membaik, aku sangat senang."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Hahaha. Non è una storia grandiosa? ... Anche io ho provato un forte dolore al cuore durante il mio allontanamento dal resto di voi. Se accettando queste condizioni, il rapporto tra fratelli potesse diventare nuovamente amichevole, ne sarei compiaciuto.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Ahahah. Ma che affarone... Anche il mio cuore era tremendamente affranto dal deterioramento dei nostri rapporti. Mi farebbe molto piacere se, accettando queste clausole, potrei riportare il nostro legame ad un piano di amicizia."
Turkish (TR): "Hahaha. Bunların hepsi bana harika geliyor. ......Sizlerden uzak kaldığım için kalbimde derin bir acı hissediyordum. Eğer bu koşulları kabul ederek kardeşlik ilişkimizi yeniden dostane bir hale getirebilirsem, bundan büyük memnuniyet duyacağım."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): I'd be happy to agree to your deal. ......Rejoice, Rosa. We have reached an understanding."
Umineko Project (UP): "I will gladly take you up on your offer. ......Be happy, Rosa. We have a deal."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I'll join in on this with pleasure. ......Be happy, Rosa. The deal is concluded."
PC Japanese (JP): 喜んで話に乗らせてもらおうじゃないか。……喜べ楼座。取引は成立だ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「喜んで話に乗らせてもらおうじゃないか。……喜べ楼座。取引は成立だ」

Steam (ST): ...Eva also keenly picked up on this. That's why she was unable to wipe away a sense of unease, even though Krauss had obediently accepted the deal.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Eva was also sensitive enough to realize this.{n}Therefore, even though Krauss had obediently accepted the deal, she was unable to wipe away her feeling of insecurity.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Eva was also sensitive enough to realize this. Therefore, even though Krauss had obediently accepted the deal, she was unable to wipe away her feeling of insecurity.
PC Japanese (JP): …それは絵羽も敏感に感じ取っていた。だから、蔵臼が素直に取引に乗ってくれたにも関わらず、その不安感を拭えずにいた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …それは絵羽も敏感に感じ取っていた。{n}だから、蔵臼が素直に取引に乗ってくれたにも関わらず、その不安感を拭えずにいた。
Russian (RU): ...Ева тоже была достаточно восприимчивой, чтобы уловить это.{n}Поэтому, хотя Краусс и покорно согласился на сделку, она не могла избавиться от чувства тревоги.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Eva também foi capaz de perceber isso.{n}No entanto, mesmo que Krauss obedientemente aceitasse o acordo, ela era incapaz de se desfazer do sentimento de insegurança.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …這當然也被機敏的繪羽察覺到了。{n}所以，雖然藏臼痛快地答應了交易，繪羽還是無法拭去心中的不安。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …这当然也被机敏的绘羽察觉到了。{n}所以，虽然藏臼痛快地答应了交易，绘羽还是无法拭去心中的不安。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Eva juga cukup peka untuk menyadari ini.{n}Karena itu, meski Krauss menerima deal dengan patuh, dia tidak bisa menghilangkan rasa tidak nyaman.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Anche Eva era abbastanza sensibile da capirlo. Quindi, nonostante Krauss avesse ubbidientemente accettato l'accordo, lei era incapace di cancellare quella sua sensazione di insicurezza.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Anche Eva fu abbastanza perspicace da capirlo. Per cui, nonostante Klaus avesse accettato l'offerta senza protestare, non riuscì a scrollarsi l'ansia di dosso.
Turkish (TR): ...Eva da bunu fark edecek kadar duyarlıydı.{n}Bu yüzden Krauss anlaşmayı itaatkâr bir şekilde kabul etmiş olsa da içindeki güvensizlik duygusunu silememişti.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "...My, how obedient of you. It's not like you at all, Nii-san."
Umineko Project (UP): "...My, how obedient. That's not like you, Nii‐san."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...My, how obedient. That's not like you, Nii-san."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…いやに素直ね。兄さんらしくもないわ」

Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "What a cruel thing to say. Are you implying I have some ulterior motive? Of course I don't. I'm just the same as all of you."
Umineko Project (UP): "That's harsh. You think I have an ulterior motive? Of course I don't. I'm just like all of you."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That's harsh. You think I have an ulterior motive? Of course there isn't one. Just the same as all of you."
PC Japanese (JP): 「それはひどいじゃないか。私に下心があるというのかね？　あるわけもないさ。お前たちと同じだ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「それはひどいじゃないか。私に下心があるというのかね？　あるわけもないさ。お前たちと同じだ」
Russian (RU): "Ну зачем ты так? Ты думаешь, я держу фигу в кармане? Конечно же нет. Так же как и все вы."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Isso é rude. Você acha que eu tenho alguma intenção oculta? É claro que não. Eu sou como todos vocês."

Steam (ST): So Rudolf panicked. He rushed to bring this nearly resolved discussion to a conclusion.
Umineko Project (UP): That gave him a sense of urgency. Trying to bring this near‐finished discussion to a conclusion, he rushed to wrap it up.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That gave him a sense of urgency. Trying to bring this near-finished discussion to a conclusion, he rushed to wrap it up.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): La cosa lo lasciava inquieto. Si affrettò a chiudere il discorso ormai concluso.
Turkish (TR): Rudolf panikledi. Neredeyse bitmek üzere olan bu tartışmayı bir sonuca bağlamak için acele etti.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "......Then we're good. ...So, Aniki, would you mind signing here? This is a written contract summarizing the discussion we've just been having. There's one for each of us. Everyone will sign for the same contents."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Then we are good. ...So, Aniki. Would you mind signing here? This is a written contract containing the discussion we have been having. There's one for each person. Everyone will sign for the same contents."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……ならいいんだ。…じゃあ兄貴。ここにサインをもらえるか。今の話を書き出した俺たちの誓約書だ。人数分ある。同じ内容に全員がサインする。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……ならいいんだ。…じゃあ兄貴。ここにサインをもらえるか。今の話を書き出した俺たちの誓約書だ。人数分ある。同じ内容に全員がサインする」
Russian (RU): "......Ну, вот и славно. ...Итак, Аники, не мог бы ты подписаться здесь? Это письменный договор, содержащий подробности нашей беседы. У каждого из нас будет один такой. Каждый из нас подпишется под таким же содержанием."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Então estamos bem. ...Bem, aniki. Se importaria de assinar aqui? Esse é um contrato escrito sobre a discussão que acabamos de ter. Tem um para cada um. Todos irão assinar sob as mesmas condições."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……那是最好。…大哥。在這簽名吧。這是寫著我們剛才說的那些的協議書。每人一張。全部都是同樣內容，大家都要簽名。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……那是最好。…大哥。在这签名吧。这是写着我们刚才说的那些的协议书。每人一张。全部都是同样内容，大家都要签名。」
Indonesian (IDN): "......Kalau begitu kita sepakat. ...Jadi, Aniki. Maukah kau menandatangani ini? Ini kontrak tertulis berisi diskusi kita. Ada satu untuk masing-masing. Semua akan menandatangani konten yang sama."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "Shouldn't deals be made between those on even footings? From my perspective, this deal will help restore the long-lost trust of my younger siblings and deepen the love between us. It's an old problem that's been eating at me, and one I would prefer to resolve as soon as possible.
Umineko Project (UP): "Shouldn't deals be made on an even footing? To me, this deal is something to restore the long lost trust of my younger brother and sisters, and deepen the love between us siblings. It has been a cancer in my heart, that I wished to resolve quickly."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Shouldn't this deal be made on an even footing? To me, this deal will restore the long lost trust of my younger brother and sisters and deepen the love between us siblings. And there has been an uneasiness in my heart to have this resolved quickly.
PC Japanese (JP): 「取引は公平な関係であるべきじゃないのかね？　この取引は私にとっては、弟や妹たちと長いこと失ってきた信頼を取り戻し、兄弟愛を深め合うもの。それは私にとって、緊急に解決したかった心のしこりだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「取引は公平な関係であるべきじゃないのかね？　この取引は私にとっては、弟や妹たちと長いこと失ってきた信頼を取り戻し、兄弟愛を深め合うもの。それは私にとって、緊急に解決したかった心のしこりだ」
Russian (RU): "Разве цель этой сделки заключается в чьём‐то ущемлении? По мне эта сделка восстановит утраченное ко мне доверие моих младшего брата и сестёр и углубит нашу любовь как братьев и сестёр. У меня на сердце было тревожно, так что хотелось уладить это дело поскорее."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Os negócios não deveriam ser feitos em pé de igualdade? Para mim, esse acordo é algo para restaurar uma longa confiança perdida entre meu irmão e minhas irmãs, e aprofundar o amor entre os irmãos. Tem sido um câncer em meu coração, que eu desejo que seja rapidamente resolvido."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「交易不是應該建立在雙方公平平等的基礎上嗎？這交易對我來說，是為了取回弟弟妹妹們對我失去已久的信任，增進我們之間的兄妹情。這對我而言，也是一樁想盡快解決的心事。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「交易不是应该建立在双方公平平等的基础上吗？这交易对我来说，是为了取回弟弟妹妹们对我失去已久的信任，增进我们之间的兄妹情。这对我而言，也是一桩想尽快解决的心事。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Bukankah kesepakatan harus dibuat secara setara? Bagiku, ini tentang memulihkan kepercayaan yang hilang antara aku dan adik-adikku, mempererat ikatan kita. Ini seperti kanker dalam hatiku yang ingin segera kuselesaikan."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Questo accordo non dovrebbe essere fatto su egual piano? Per me, questo accordo ripristinerebbe la fiducia da lungo tempo persa di mio fratello e delle mie sorelle minori e intensificherebbe l'amore tra noi fratelli. E c'è stata una sensazione di disagio nel mio cuore per voler decidere questo in fretta.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Gli accordi non andrebbero stipulati tra coloro che sono in un rapporto paritario? Per me questo accordo ripristinerebbe la fiducia che mio fratello e le mie sorelle hanno perso molto tempo fa, e intensificherebbe l'amore fraterno che scorre tra noi. È un peso che porto nel cuore, di cui vorrei liberarmi al più presto."
Turkish (TR): "Anlaşmaların eşit şartlarda yapılması gerekmez mi? Benim için bu anlaşma, küçük kardeşlerimin uzun zamandır kaybolan güvenini yeniden kazanmamı sağlayacak ve biz kardeşler arasındaki sevgiyi derinleştirecek bir şey. Bu, kalbimde hızla çözüme kavuşturmak istediğim bir sorundu."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "Hideyoshi-san, I hear your company has been doing extremely well lately. At a brisk pace, it went public, and both its track record and its stock prices have soared. I am truly jealous."

Steam (ST): That amount tends to be far greater than a business's normal profits. So, this is an extremely effective way to gather massive funds to expand a business even further.
