Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Tuttavia, in cambio dei finanziamenti per la compagnia, gli azionisti acquisiscono una serie di diritti.
Turkish (TR): Bununla birlikte, şirketi finanse etme karşılığında, hissedarların belirli hakları vardır.

Steam (ST): They're given rights that allow them to observe and guide the company they've invested in, leading to profits even greater than their original investments.
Umineko Project (UP): Namely, the right to observe and guide the company that they have financed, in order to raise its profits above their investment.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That was, in order to give the company that they had financed even greater profit, they had the right to observe and control it.
PC Japanese (JP): それは、自分たちが融資した会社が、融資した以上の利益を上げられるよう監視し、指導する権利である。
Russian (RU): Таким образом, те, кто профинансировал компанию, благодаря чему та смогла получить ещё большую прибыль, имели право наблюдать за ней и управлять ею.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nomeadamente, o direito de observar e orientar a empresa que ele está financiando, a fim de aumentar o lucro em cima de seus investimentos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是一種為了能讓自己融資的公司賺得超過融資的利益，而進行監視、指揮的權利。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是一种为了能让自己融资的公司赚得超过融资的利益，而进行监视、指挥的权利。
Indonesian (IDN): Yaitu hak mengawasi dan memandu perusahaan demi meningkatkan keuntungan.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Uno di questi era, al fine di dare alla società che finanziavano un profitto perfino maggiore, avere il diritto di osservarla e controllarla.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Uno di questi è il diritto di supervisionare e dirigere la compagnia finanziata, al fine di incrementarne i profitti in misura superiore ai finanziamenti...
Turkish (TR): Yani, kârlarını yatırımlarının üzerine çıkarmak için finanse ettikleri şirketi gözlemleme ve yönlendirme hakkı.

Steam (ST): ......This right is guaranteed to the stockholders, and they sometimes use it to dismiss ineffectual management.
Umineko Project (UP): ......That right is guaranteed to all stockholders, and they sometimes even use it to reorganize ineffectual management.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......That right was guaranteed to all stockholders, and they would sometimes use it to dismiss ineffectual management.
PC Japanese (JP): ……その権利は株主総会で保証され、時には彼らによって無能な経営陣が更迭されることすらある。
Russian (RU): ......Подобное право гарантировалось всем акционерам, и они иногда используют его, чтобы уволить некомпетентное руководство.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Esse direito é garantido a todos os acionistas, e algumas vezes eles até usam isso para reorganizar uma gestão ineficiente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這種權力受股東大會的保證，時而他們也會把無能的公司管理層替換掉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这种权力受股东大会的保证，时而他们也会把无能的公司管理层替换掉。
Indonesian (IDN): ......Hak yang dijamin untuk semua pemegang saham, bahkan bisa digunakan untuk mereorganisasi manajemen tidak kompeten.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Questo diritto era garantito a tutti gli azionisti, e a volte loro lo utilizzavano per evitare affari inconcludenti.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Questo diritto è garantito all'assemblea generale degli azionisti, e a volte essi lo usano per rimpiazzare dirigenti incompetenti.
Turkish (TR): ......Bu hak tüm hissedarlar için garanti altındadır ve hatta bazen bu hakkı etkisiz yönetimi yeniden düzenlemek için kullanırlar.

Steam (ST): The "right" allows them to keep an eye on management and prevent the money they've invested in the company from going to waste.
Umineko Project (UP): It is the "right" to prevent the money they have spent financing the company from going to waste, by watching the management of the company.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was the 'right' to prevent the money they had spent financing the company from going to waste by watching the management of the company.
PC Japanese (JP): 経営を監視することによって、自分たちの融資した額が無駄にならないようにする「権利」なのである。
Russian (RU): Это было "право" предотвращения пустой траты денег, вложенных ими в компанию, путём наблюдения за руководством компании.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Esse é o "direito" que eles têm para prevenir que o dinheiro que eles gastaram financiando a empresa seja desperdiçado, observando a gestão da empresa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是一種通過監視經營狀況，以確保自己融資的金錢不會被白白浪費的「權利」。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是一种通过监视经营状况，以确保自己融资的金钱不会被白白浪费的「权利」。
Indonesian (IDN): Ini "hak" untuk mencegah uang mereka terbuang sia-sia.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era il ‘diritto’ di prevenire che il denaro da loro speso per finanziare la società venisse sprecato, controllando la gestione della compagnia.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Mediante la supervisione della gestione, hanno il ‘diritto’ di far sì che le somme finanziate non vengano sprecate.
Turkish (TR): Bu, şirketin yönetimini izleyerek, şirketi finanse etmek için harcadıkları paranın boşa gitmesini önleme "hakkıdır".

Steam (ST): However, if they use it forcibly, they can eject the former management and take over the company.
Umineko Project (UP): However, if they use this right forcibly, they can eject the former management and take over the company.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, if they use this right forcibly, they can eject the former management and take over the company.
PC Japanese (JP): だが、その権利を強権的に行使すれば、会社の経営陣を全て追い出し、会社を乗っ取ることもできる。
Russian (RU): Однако если они используют это право в принудительном порядке, то тем самым они могут вытеснить прежнее руководство и сами завладеть компанией.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No entanto, se eles usarem desses direitos à força, eles podem eleger uma nova direção e assumir a empresa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，若把這種權利當作強權來使用，那麼甚至可以把公司管理層全部趕出去，從而奪取整間公司。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，若把这种权利当作强权来使用，那么甚至可以把公司管理层全部赶出去，从而夺取整间公司。
Indonesian (IDN): Tapi jika dipaksakan, mereka bisa mengusir manajemen lama dan mengambil alih.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, se esercitavano prepotentemente questo diritto, potevano espellere la gestione precedente e rilevare la società.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ma se essi lo esercitano con prepotenza, possono espellere tutta la dirigenza, e prendere il controllo della società...
Turkish (TR): Ancak bu hakkı zorla kullanırlarsa eski yönetimi görevden alıp şirketi ele geçirebilirler.

Steam (ST): ...After all, dismissing management and nominating new management are powers held by the general body of all shareholders.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Because the general body of all stockholders has the power to dismiss the management and nominate new management.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Because the general body of all shareholders has the power to dismiss the management and nominate new management.
PC Japanese (JP): …株主総会には、経営陣の罷免と新しい経営陣を指名する権限もあるからだ。
Russian (RU): ...Поскольку основная часть акционеров имеет право на увольнение и назначение нового руководства.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Porque todos os acionistas possuem o poder de demitir uma direção e nominar uma nova.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …這是因為，股東大會也具有罷免、提名公司管理層的權限。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …这是因为，股东大会也具有罢免、提名公司管理层的权限。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Karena pemegang saham punya kekuasaan memecat dan menunjuk manajemen baru.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Perché il corpo generale di tutti gli azionisti ha il potere di destituire l'amministrazione e nominarne una nuova.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Questo perché l'assemblea generale degli azionisti ha il potere di destituire l'amministrazione, e di nominarne una nuova.
Turkish (TR): ...Çünkü tüm hissedarların genel kurulu, yönetimi görevden alma ve yeni yönetim atama yetkisine sahiptir.

Steam (ST): That power is determined by the majority decision of the stockholders. And people who hold more stock get to cast more votes.
Umineko Project (UP): That right is exercised on a majority decision by the stockholders.{n}And people who hold more stock get to cast more votes.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That power is determined based on the majority decision of the stockholders. And people who hold more stock get to cast more votes.
PC Japanese (JP): この権利は株主たちの多数決で決まる。そして多くの株を持つ者が、その数分、多く投票できるのだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): この権利は株主たちの多数決で決まる。{n}そして多くの株を持つ者が、その数分、多く投票できるのだ。
Russian (RU): Данное полномочие реализуется решением большинства акционеров.{n}И люди, владеющие наибольшим количеством акций, обладают наибольшим количеством голосов.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Esse direito é exercido pela decisão de votos da maior parte dos acionistas.{n}E aqueles que têm mais ações têm um maior poder de voto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這一權力，由股東們投票的多數票決定。{n}而且持有的股票越多，所能投的票也越多。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这一权力，由股东们投票的多数票决定。{n}而且持有的股票越多，所能投的票也越多。
Indonesian (IDN): Hak ini dijalankan berdasarkan suara terbanyak.{n}Dan yang punya lebih banyak saham dapat lebih banyak suara.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quel potere è determinato in base alla maggioranza degli azionisti. E le persone che hanno più azioni hanno diritto a più voti.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Tale diritto è deciso dal voto di maggioranza degli azionisti. E le persone che detengono più azioni possono dare molti più voti.
Turkish (TR): Bu hak, hissedarlar tarafından çoğunluk kararıyla kullanılır.{n}Ve daha fazla hisseye sahip olan kişiler daha fazla oy kullanma hakkına sahiptir.

Steam (ST): In other words, if some person or group holds a majority of the stock, they can freely chase out the old management and make the president anyone they'd like.
Umineko Project (UP): In other words, if some person or group holds a majority of the stock, they can freely chase out the old management and make the president anyone they would like.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In other words, if some person or group holds a majority of the stock, they can freely chase out the old management and make the president anyone they would like.
PC Japanese (JP): つまり、過半数の株を持つ者、もしくは勢力は、自分たちの自由に経営陣を追い出し、好きな者を社長にできるのである。
Russian (RU): Другими словами, если один человек или группа владеют большинством акций, они могут свободно уволить старое руководство и назначить президентом того, кого посчитают нужным.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em outras palavras, se uma pessoa ou grupo é detentora da maior parte das ações, ela pode livremente afastar a antiga administração e eleger quem eles quiserem como novo presidente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 也就是說，持有超過半數股票的人或者團體，可以自由地更換公司管理層，想讓誰當社長都行。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 也就是说，持有超过半数股票的人或者团体，可以自由地更换公司管理层，想让谁当社长都行。
Indonesian (IDN): Singkatnya, jika seseorang atau kelompok memegang saham mayoritas, mereka bisa bebas mengubah manajemen.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In altre parole, se qualche persona o gruppo detiene la maggioranza delle azioni, essi possono liberamente cacciar via la vecchia amministrazione ed eleggere presidente chiunque vogliano loro.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): In altre parole, le persone che detengono la maggioranza delle azioni, o in altre parole, chi ha il potere, può espellere la dirigenza a suo piacimento, ed eleggere a presidente chiunque voglia.
Turkish (TR): Başka bir deyişle, eğer bir kişi ya da grup hisselerin çoğunluğunu elinde tutuyorsa, eski yönetimi serbestçe kovabilir ve istedikleri kişiyi başkan yapabilirler.

Steam (ST): If they want, it's also possible for them to make themselves president.
Umineko Project (UP): If they want, it is even possible for them to make themselves president.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If they want, it is also possible for them to make themselves president.
PC Japanese (JP): 望めば、自らが社長に着くことすら可能なのだ。
Russian (RU): Если они захотят, любому из них позволено сделать себя президентом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se eles quiserem, eles podem até mesmo se tornar o novo presidente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 若是想的話，自己去當社長都行。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 若是想的话，自己去当社长都行。
Indonesian (IDN): Bahkan bisa menjadikan diri sendiri sebagai presiden direktur.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se lo volessero, sarebbe possibile eleggere loro stessi come presidente.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Se lo volesse, potrebbe egli stesso salire al rango di presidente.
Turkish (TR): Hatta isterlerse kendilerini başkan yapmaları bile mümkündür.

Steam (ST): Most companies take various defensive measures to stop malicious people from buying up their stock and threatening their position, like ensuring that lots of stock is bought by those close to them, such as company employees.
Umineko Project (UP): Many companies, in order to prevent their stock from being bought up by malicious people and their position from being threatened, take some kind of defensive measures, such as having their own employees or people close to them buy a lot of stock certificates, in order to prevent a hostile group from securing the majority.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In many companies, their stock gets bought up by malicious people and, in order to prevent their position from being threatened, they make their own employees or people close to them buy a lot of stock certificates. To prevent hostile action from being taken by the majority, they try to take some kind of defensive measures.
PC Japanese (JP): 多くの会社は、悪意ある者に株が買い占められて自分たちの立場が脅かされないよう、株券を自社の社員などの身内に多く購入させるなどして、敵対勢力が過半数を抑えることがないよう、何らかの防御策を取っている。
Russian (RU): В случае многих компаний, их акции приобретались нечистыми на руку людьми, и тогда, чтобы воспрепятствовать нестабильности своего положения, владельцы компании старались продать как можно больше сертификатов на получение акций своим сотрудникам или приближённым к ним людям. Стремясь не дать большинству взять над ними верх, руководители стараются предпринять какие‐нибудь защитные меры.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Muitas empresas, a fim de evitar que as suas ações sejam compradas por pessoas mal‐intencionadas e ter sua posição ameaçada, tomam algumas providências defensivas, tal como fazer com que os próprios empregados ou pessoas próximas comprem ações certificadas, a fim de evitar que um grupo hostil detenha a maioria delas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 為了不讓居心不良的人買下自己公司大部分股票，很多公司都設有防御策略，通過讓自己公司的職員或自己人大量購買等方式，使敵對團體沒有機會取得超過半數的股票。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 为了不让居心不良的人买下自己公司大部分股票，很多公司都设有防御策略，通过让自己公司的职员或自己人大量购买等方式，使敌对团体没有机会取得超过半数的股票。
Indonesian (IDN): Banyak perusahaan mengambil langkah defensif seperti meminta karyawan atau orang dekat membeli banyak saham, untuk mencegah pengambilalihan bermusuhan.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In molte società, le loro azioni vengono comprate da persone con pochi scrupoli e, per cercare di prevenire che la loro posizione sia minacciata, fanno comprare molte azioni ai loro impiegati o alle persone a loro vicine. Per evitare azioni ostili prese dalla maggioranza, loro provano a prendere alcune misure difensive.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): In molte società, per evitare che le azioni vengano comprate da gente priva di scrupoli, e così compromettere le loro posizioni, ne vengono fatte comprare molte ai loro impiegati o a membri dell'organizzazione, e si prendono delle misure difensive per evitare che forze ostili controllino la maggioranza.
Turkish (TR): Birçok şirket, hisselerinin kötü niyetli kişiler tarafından satın alınmasını ve konumlarının tehdit edilmesini önlemek amacıyla, düşman bir grubun çoğunluğu ele geçirmesini engellemek için kendi çalışanlarına veya kendilerine yakın kişilere çok sayıda hisse senedi satın aldırmak gibi bir tür savunma önlemi almaktadır.

Steam (ST): However, Hideyoshi's company had only recently become stock-listed, and he hadn't had time to strengthen those defensive measures.
Umineko Project (UP): However, since Hideyoshi's company had only recently become stock‐listed, they hadn't had the time to strengthen those defensive measures.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, since Hideyoshi's company had only recently become stock-listed, he hadn't had the time to strengthen those defensive measures.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、秀吉の会社は上場から日が浅く、その辺りの防御策を固める時間が足りなかった。
Russian (RU): Вот только поскольку компания Хидэёши лишь недавно зарегистрировалась на бирже, у него не было времени прибегнуть к подобным защитным мерам.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No entanto, como a empresa de Hideyoshi recém havia se tornado uma empresa com ações na bolsa, eles não tiveram tempo para fortalecer suas medidas defensivas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可是秀吉的公司上市時日不長，還沒時間定下防御策略。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可是秀吉的公司上市时日不长，还没时间定下防御策略。
Indonesian (IDN): Tapi karena perusahaan Hideyoshi baru go public, mereka belum sempat memperkuat pertahanan.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, dato che la società di Hideyoshi è stata quotata in borsa solo da poco, lui non ha avuto il tempo di rinforzare tali misure difensive.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ma la società di Hideyoshi era stata quotata da poco in borsa, e lui non ebbe il tempo di rinforzare queste misure difensive.
Turkish (TR): Ancak Hideyoshi'nin şirketi kısa bir süre önce borsaya açıldığında, bu savunma önlemlerini güçlendirecek zamanları olmamıştı.

Steam (ST): Or...maybe Hideyoshi was so engrossed in the management of his company that he couldn't properly understand the dangers of being stock-listed.
Umineko Project (UP): No, maybe Hideyoshi himself was so engrossed in the management of his company that he hadn't realized the dangers of being stock‐listed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): No, maybe Hideyoshi himself was so engrossed in the management of his company that he couldn't realize the dangers of being stock-listed.
PC Japanese (JP): いや、秀吉自身、会社経営に現を抜かし、上場の恐ろしさをよく理解していなかったこともあるかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Нет, возможно, Хидэёши был настолько увлечён управлением своей компанией, что даже не осознавал всех опасностей регистрации на бирже.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não, talvez o próprio Hideyoshi estivesse tão ocupado em gerenciar a sua empresa que nem percebeu dos perigos de ser uma empresa com ações na bolsa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不對，或許該說秀吉只顧著經營公司，而沒能好好理解到上市的風險。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不对，或许该说秀吉只顾着经营公司，而没能好好理解到上市的风险。
Indonesian (IDN): Atau mungkin Hideyoshi terlalu asyik mengurus bisnis sampai lalai akan bahaya go public.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): No, forse Hideyoshi stesso era così occupato dalla gestione della società che non è riuscito ad accorgersi dei pericoli derivanti dall'essere quotati in borsa.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): No, forse è stato Hideyoshi stesso a non comprendere bene i pericoli derivanti dall'essere quotati in borsa, assorbito com'era dalla gestione della società.
Turkish (TR): Hayır, belki de Hideyoshi şirketinin yönetimine o kadar dalmıştı ki borsaya açılmanın tehlikelerini fark etmemişti.

Steam (ST): It's hard to say whether he should be viewed as a kind-hearted manager immersed in the work of management, or a foolish manager who had his feet swept out from under him...
Umineko Project (UP): It's hard to say whether he should be viewed as a kind‐hearted and skilled manager immersed in management, or a foolish manager who had his feet swept out from under him...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It's hard to say whether he should be viewed as a kind-hearted and skilled manager immersed in management, or a foolish manager who had his feet swept out from under him...
PC Japanese (JP): それを、彼が経営に没頭する良心的な良い経営者と見るか、足下をさらわれた愚かな経営者と見るかは難しいのだが…。
Russian (RU): Трудно сказать, следует ли его рассматривать как доброго и способного руководителя, поглощённого своей работой, или как глупого руководителя, у которого выбили почву из‐под ног...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É difícil dizer se ele foi um gerente bondoso e qualificado e que estava imerso na gestão ou se ele foi um gerente tolo que não andava com os pés no chão...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不知該評價他是個埋頭經營、忠於本職的好老板好呢，還是不知道先站穩腳跟的蠢老板好呢…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不知该评价他是个埋头经营、忠于本职的好老板好呢，还是不知道先站稳脚跟的蠢老板好呢…。
Indonesian (IDN): Sulit mengatakan apakah dia manajer baik yang terampil atau bodoh yang lengah...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): È difficile dire se dovesse essere visto come un direttore qualificato e di buon cuore immerso nella gestione, o uno sciocco direttore che si era fatto fregare da sotto il naso...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): È difficile valutare se come direttore fosse stato onesto, di buon cuore e devoto alla gestione della sua azienda, o uno sciocco che si era fatto fregare da sotto il naso...
Turkish (TR): Onu iyi kalpli ve yetenekli bir yönetici olarak mı yoksa ayakları altından çekilmiş aptal bir yönetici olarak mı görmek gerekir, kestirmek zor...

Steam (ST): ...In other words, there existed some people who wouldn't let him get away with that naivety unscathed.
Umineko Project (UP): ...But in any case, there were people out there who would not let him get away with that naivety unscathed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...There were people out there who would not let him get away with that naivety unscathed.
PC Japanese (JP): …その甘さを、見逃さない連中がいたということである。
Russian (RU): ...Увы, нашлись люди, которые не могли пройти мимо такой наивности, не воспользовавшись ею.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Mas de qualquer forma, havia pessoas que não iriam deixar ele sair ileso com toda essa ingenuidade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …總之，有一幫人沒有放過他的這份天真。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …总之，有一帮人没有放过他的这份天真。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Tapi yang pasti, ada orang yang takkan membiarkan kenaifannya tanpa konsekuensi.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... C'erano persone lì fuori che non gli lascerebbero impunita tale ingenuità.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ci fu un gruppo di persone che non ignorò questa ingenuità.
Turkish (TR): ...Ama her halükarda, dışarıda bu saflığın yanına kâr kalmasına izin vermeyecek insanlar vardı.

Steam (ST): They began repeatedly buying up stock in Hideyoshi's company, rapidly gaining such strength that they couldn't be ignored.
Umineko Project (UP): They rapidly bought up Hideyoshi's company's stock and instantly gained a significant amount of power.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They began repeatedly buying up Hideyoshi's company's stock and suddenly gained such strength that they couldn't be ignored.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼らは秀吉の会社の株を次々に買い集め、無視できぬ勢力を一気に築き上げた。
Russian (RU): Они неоднократно занимались скупкой акций компании Хидэёши и неожиданно обрели такую силу, что с ними нельзя было не считаться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles rapidamente levantaram o estoque da empresa de Hideyoshi e instantaneamente conseguiram uma quantidade significativa de poder.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他們收購的秀吉公司的股票越來越多，一口氣變成了不能忽視的團體。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他们收购的秀吉公司的股票越来越多，一口气变成了不能忽视的团体。
Indonesian (IDN): Mereka cepat membeli saham perusahaan Hideyoshi dan langsung dapat pengaruh besar.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Iniziarono a comprare ripetutamente le azioni della società di Hideyoshi e improvvisamente guadagnarono un simile potere da non poter essere ignorati.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Iniziarono a comprare le azioni della società di Hideyoshi, una dopo l'altra, e in un lampo costruirono un'influenza che non poteva essere ignorata.
Turkish (TR): Hideyoshi'nin şirketinin hisselerini hızla satın aldılar ve anında önemli miktarda güç kazandılar.

Steam (ST): They then sent anonymous documents to the shareholders in an attempt to gain control of a majority.
Umineko Project (UP): They then sent anonymous documents to the stockholders and began to capture the majority.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They then sent anonymous documents to the shareholders and began to capture the majority.
PC Japanese (JP): そして株主たちに怪文書を送りつけ多数派工作を仕掛けてきた。
Russian (RU): В то же время они отправляли анонимные документы акционерам и начали завоёвывать большинство.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Enviando documentos anônimos para os acionistas e começando a obter a maioria.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後為了投票時能多數通過，他們又向股東們寄起了黑信。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后为了投票时能多数通过，他们又向股东们寄起了黑信。
Indonesian (IDN): Mereka mengirim dokumen anonim ke pemegang saham dan mulai menguasai mayoritas.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Poi mandarono documenti anonimi agli azionisti e cominciarono a conquistare la maggioranza.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dopodiché iniziarono a spedire lettere minatorie anonime agli azionisti, per poter manipolare la maggioranza.
Turkish (TR): Ardından hissedarlara anonim belgeler gönderdiler ve çoğunluğu ele geçirmeye başladılar.

Steam (ST): The documents read: 'The current management continues to make pointless investments and is ignoring the needs of the stockholders. Let us force the current management to retire, cut the current wasted investments, and let this company be born again as one that gives more back to the stockholders.'
Umineko Project (UP): The documents read: "The current management continues to make pointless investments and is ignoring the needs of the stockholders. Let us force the current management to retire, cut the current wasted investments, and let this company be born again as one that gives more back to the stockholders."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The documents read: 'The current management continues to make pointless investments and is ignoring the needs of the stockholders. Let us force the current management to retire, cut the current wasted investments, and let this company be born again as one that gives more back to the stockholders.'
PC Japanese (JP): 曰く、「現経営陣は無駄な投資を繰り返し株主への還元を怠っている。現経営陣を退陣させ、投資の無駄を省き株主への還元の多い会社へと生まれ変わらせよう」と。
Russian (RU): Документы гласили: "Нынешнее руководство продолжает делать бессмысленные инвестиции, не считаясь с нуждами акционеров. Давайте вынудим уйти в отставку текущее руководство, прекратим растрачиваемые впустую инвестиции и вновь возродим эту компанию как приносящую ещё больший откуп акционерам."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os documentos diziam: "A atual administração continua fazendo investimentos inúteis e ignorando as necessidades dos acionistas. Nos forçando a aposentar a atual gestão, cortando investimentos desnecessários e deixando com que a empresa renasça e favoreça mais os acionistas."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 上書說：「現公司管理層不斷重複著無用的投資，而怠慢了對股東們的還利。建議辭退現公司管理層，盡量減少無用投資，讓公司重獲新生，蛻變為能向股東返還最大利潤的新公司」。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 上书说：「现公司管理层不断重复着无用的投资，而怠慢了对股东们的还利。建议辞退现公司管理层，尽量减少无用投资，让公司重获新生，蜕变为能向股东返还最大利润的新公司」。
Indonesian (IDN): Isinya: "Manajemen saat ini terus melakukan investasi sia-sia dan mengabaikan kebutuhan pemegang saham. Mari paksa mereka pensiun, hentikan investasi sia-sia, dan lahirkan kembali perusahaan yang memberi lebih untuk pemegang saham."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il documento recitava: ‘L'amministrazione attuale continua a fare inutili investimenti e sta ignorando le necessità degli azionisti. Obblighiamo l'attuale amministrazione a ritirarsi, tagliare i correnti investimenti sprecati, e facciamo rinascere questa compagnia come una che dia maggiore importanza agli azionisti. ’
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il documento recitava: ‘La dirigenza attuale continua a fare investimenti inutili, e trascura gli introiti degli azionisti. Costringiamo l'amministrazione attuale a dimettersi, diamo un taglio agli investimenti insensati, e trasformiamo questa compagnia in una nuova, che dia ai suoi azionisti molti più profitti’.
Turkish (TR): Belgelerde şöyle yazıyordu: "Mevcut yönetim anlamsız yatırımlar yapmaya devam ediyor ve hissedarların ihtiyaçlarını görmezden geliyor. Mevcut yönetimi emekliliğe zorlayalım, boşa giden mevcut yatırımları keselim ve bu şirketin hissedarlara daha fazla getiri sağlayan bir şirket olarak yeniden doğmasına izin verelim."

Steam (ST): It's very difficult to make the actual state of a company's management known.
Umineko Project (UP): It is very difficult to make the actual state of a company's management known.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 会社の経営実態を正しく知らしめることはとても難しい。
Russian (RU): Сделать реальное положение дел в компании общеизвестным — очень непростая задача.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É muito complicado fazer a gestão atual de uma empresa conhecida.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 讓股東們正確地了解公司真正的經營狀況是很難的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 让股东们正确地了解公司真正的经营状况是很难的。
Indonesian (IDN): Sulit menjelaskan keadaan sebenarnya manajemen perusahaan.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): È molto difficile rendere conosciuto l'attuale stato di una amministrazione di una società.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Rendere noto con esattezza lo stato reale della gestione di una società è molto complicato...
Turkish (TR): Bir şirketin yönetiminin gerçek durumunu duyurmak çok zordur.

Steam (ST): ...The fruits of Hideyoshi's sleepless nights and constant concern for his company were cruelly distorted, and he lost the trust of his stockholders.
Umineko Project (UP): ...They maliciously twisted the figures Hideyoshi had produced from a tiny amount of sleep and a constant concern for his company, and made him lose the trust of his stockholders.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...The success created by Hideyoshi's tiny amount of sleep and his constant concern for his company was cruelly twisted, and he lost the trust of his stockholders.
PC Japanese (JP): …秀吉が寝る間も惜しみ常に会社のためを思って出してきた成果を、悪意で曲解させ、株主たちの信頼を失わせたのである。
Russian (RU): ...Тот успех, которого Хидэёши добился, тратя на сон минимальное необходимое количество часов и постоянно заботясь о компании, оказался полностью искажён, из‐за чего он утратил доверие своих акционеров.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Essa maliciosa reviravolta fez com que Hideyoshi perdesse seu sono com suas constantes preocupações com a empresa, e o fez perder a confiança de seus acionistas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …秀吉連睡覺的時間都捨不得，一切為公司著想而成就的事業，被他們惡意曲解。而結果，秀吉喪失了股東們的信任。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …秀吉连睡觉的时间都舍不得，一切为公司着想而成就的事业，被他们恶意曲解。而结果，秀吉丧失了股东们的信任。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Mereka memutarbalikkan angka yang Hideyoshi dapatkan dengan kerja keras, membuatnya kehilangan kepercayaan pemegang saham.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Il successo creato dalle poche ore di sonno di Hideyoshi e la sua costante preoccupazione per la sua società furono crudelmente ritorte contro di lui, e perse la fiducia dei suoi azionisti.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): I risultati ottenuti da Hideyoshi, il quale pensava sempre al bene dell'azienda al punto da non dormirci la notte, vennero volontariamente travisati, e perse la fiducia dei suoi azionisti.
Turkish (TR): ...Hideyoshi'nin azıcık uykuyla ve şirketi için sürekli endişelenerek ürettiği rakamları kötü niyetle çarpıttılar ve hissedarlarının güvenini kaybetmesine neden oldular.

Steam (ST): Thanks to these efforts, this group had almost collected a majority of the company's stock.
Umineko Project (UP): Their efforts had almost collected a majority of the stock in the company.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Their efforts had almost collected a majority of the stock in the company.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼ら勢力は過半数に近い株を抑え始めていた。
Russian (RU): Их усилиями была собрана большая часть акций компании.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Seus esforços já tinham coletado a maior parte das ações da empresa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他們那個團體的所持股票已經漸漸接近半數了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他们那个团体的所持股票已经渐渐接近半数了。
Indonesian (IDN): Usaha mereka hampir mengumpulkan saham mayoritas.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): I loro sforzi avevano quasi raccolto la maggioranza delle azioni della compagnia.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Essi avevano ottenuto il controllo di un numero di azioni abbastanza grande da poter controllare la maggioranza...
Turkish (TR): Onların çabaları neredeyse şirketteki hisselerin çoğunluğunu toplamıştı.

Steam (ST): ...At that point, even Hideyoshi noticed and started to buy back the stock, but the stockholders realized that the company was undergoing an acquisition maneuver... and each demanded a ridiculous price for the shares that Hideyoshi was trying to buy back.
Umineko Project (UP): ...At that point, even Hideyoshi noticed and started to buy back the stock, but the stockholders, who realized that the company was undergoing an acquisition maneuver, demanded a ridiculous price for the shares that Hideyoshi was trying to buy back.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...At that point, even Hideyoshi noticed and started to buy back the stock, but the stock holders, who realized that the company was undergoing an acquisition maneuver, demanded a ridiculous price for the shares that Hideyoshi was trying to buy back.
PC Japanese (JP): …この時点で秀吉も気付き、株の買い戻しを始めたが、会社が買収工作を受けていることを理解している株主たちは、秀吉の買戻し、もしくは総会での白紙委任状への判子に対し皆がそれぞれ法外な金額を要求。
Russian (RU): ...Тут даже Хидэёши заметил это и начал выкупать акции обратно, но их держатели, осознавшие, что компания перешла к стратегии их возврата, затребовали немыслимые деньги за те акции, которые Хидэёши попытался выкупить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Nesse ponto, mesmo que Hideyoshi percebesse e começasse a comprar as ações de volta, aqueles que perceberam que a empresa estava passando por uma manobra de aquisição, exigiram um preço absurdo pelas ações que Hideyoshi estava tentando comprar de volta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …這時候秀吉也已經察覺到了，開始把股票買回來。但是知道公司正在被收購的股東們，對於秀吉要買回來的東西，股票也好，股東大會委任書的印章也好，全都獅子大開口，給秀吉開出高價。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …这时候秀吉也已经察觉到了，开始把股票买回来。但是知道公司正在被收购的股东们，对于秀吉要买回来的东西，股票也好，股东大会委任书的印章也好，全都狮子大开口，给秀吉开出高价。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Saat itu Hideyoshi baru sadar dan mulai membeli kembali saham, tapi pemegang saham yang tahu sedang terjadi aksi pengambilalihan, meminta harga gila-gilaan.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... A quel punto, anche Hideyoshi se ne accorse e iniziò a ricomprare le azioni, ma gli azionisti, che avevano capito che la società era sotto una manovra di rilevamento, chiedevano un prezzo assurdo per le parti azionarie che Hideyoshi stava provando a ricomprare.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): A quel punto anche Hideyoshi si accorse che qualcosa non andava, e iniziò a ricomprare le azioni, ma gli azionisti, che avevano capito che la società stava subendo una manovra di acquisizione, chiesero ad Hideyoshi dei prezzi esorbitanti per il riacquisto delle azioni, oppure per siglare carta bianca durante l'assemblea generale.
Turkish (TR): ...O noktada Hideyoshi bile durumu fark edip hisseleri geri almaya başlamıştı ancak şirketin bir satın alma manevrası içinde olduğunu anlayan hissedarlar, Hideyoshi'nin geri almaya çalıştığı hisseler için gülünç fiyatlar talep ettiler.

Steam (ST): They continually tortured Hideyoshi, who had no leeway in the negotiation of the price.
Umineko Project (UP): They continually tortured Hideyoshi, who had no leeway in the negotiation of the price.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They continually tortured Hideyoshi, who had no leeway in the negotiation of the price.
PC Japanese (JP): 金額交渉の余地のない秀吉を苛み続けていた。
Russian (RU): Они вконец замучили Хидэёши, который был крайне ограничен в ходе переговоров о цене.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles continuaram a torturar Hideyoshi, que não tinha mais margem para poder negociar os preços.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不停地折磨著沒法還價的秀吉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不停地折磨着没法还价的秀吉。
Indonesian (IDN): Mereka terus menyiksa Hideyoshi yang tak punya ruang negosiasi.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Torturavano continuamente Hideyoshi, che non aveva più margine di trattativa riguardo il prezzo.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Essi tormentavano continuamente Hideyoshi, che non aveva margini di trattativa.
Turkish (TR): Fiyat pazarlığında hiçbir söz hakkı olmayan Hideyoshi'ye sürekli işkence ettiler.

Steam (ST): One of the certainties of capitalism is that the price will rise when two parties vie for the same thing.
Umineko Project (UP): One of the certainties of capitalism is that value will rise when both parties vie for the same thing.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): One of the certainties of capitalism is that value will rise when both parties vie for the same thing.
PC Japanese (JP): 互いの勢力が欲しがる物は価値が上がるのは資本主義の必定。
Russian (RU): Одно из явлений капитализма заключается в том, что цена начинает повышаться, как только две стороны начинают соперничать за одну и ту же вещь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Uma das certezas do capitalismo é que o valor vai subir quando ambas as partes disputarem pela mesma coisa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雙方都想要的東西，價值就會漲，此乃資本主義的必然。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 双方都想要的东西，价值就会涨，此乃资本主义的必然。
Indonesian (IDN): Salah satu kepastian kapitalisme: nilai akan naik saat dua pihak memperebutkan hal sama.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Una delle certezze del capitalismo è che un valore tende a salire se entrambe le parti sono in lizza per la stessa cosa.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Una delle certezze del capitalismo è che se una cosa è desiderata da ambo le parti, il suo valore salirà.
Turkish (TR): Kapitalizmin kesin kurallarından biri, her iki taraf da aynı şey için rekabet ettiğinde değerin yükseleceğidir.

Steam (ST): And one of the certainties of democracy is that the majority controls everything.
Umineko Project (UP): And one of the certainties of democracy is that the majority controls everything.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And one of the certainties of democracy is that the majority controls everything.
PC Japanese (JP): そして、多数決に勝った者が全てを支配するのも民主主義の必定。
Russian (RU): А одним из определений демократии является то, что всем управляет большинство.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E uma das certezas da democracia é que a maioria é quem controla tudo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而獲得多數票的勝者支配一切，乃是民主主義的必然。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而获得多数票的胜者支配一切，乃是民主主义的必然。
Indonesian (IDN): Dan kepastian demokrasi: mayoritas mengendalikan segalanya.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E una delle certezze della democrazia è che la maggioranza controlla tutto.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E una delle certezze della democrazia è che chi ottiene la maggioranza, controlla tutto.
Turkish (TR): Demokrasinin kesin kurallarından biri de çoğunluğun her şeyi kontrol etmesidir.

Steam (ST): So in the end, whoever manages to buy up the most stock wins.
Umineko Project (UP): So in the end, whoever manages to buy up the most stock wins.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So in the end, whoever manages to buy up the most stock wins.
PC Japanese (JP): つまり最後には、より多くの株を買い集めることができたものが勝つ。
Russian (RU): Поэтому в итоге тот, кто сможет приобрести большую часть акций, и станет победителем.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, no fim, aquele que comprasse a maior parte das ações venceria.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 也就是說，最後誰能搞到更多的股票就是誰的勝利。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 也就是说，最后谁能搞到更多的股票就是谁的胜利。
Indonesian (IDN): Jadi akhirnya, siapa yang bisa beli paling banyak saham menang.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Così alla fine, chiunque riesca a rilevare la maggioranza delle azioni vince.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Per cui alla fine, vince chi acquista più azioni di tutti...
Turkish (TR): Yani işin sonunda, kim en çok hisseyi satın almayı başarırsa o kazanır.

Steam (ST): ...Put another way, whoever has the most money wins.
Umineko Project (UP): ...So whoever has the most money wins.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …つまり、より多くのカネを集めたものが勝つ。
Russian (RU): ...А это, в свою очередь, означает, что победа достанется тому, у кого окажется больше денег.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...O que significa que quem tem mais dinheiro ganha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …更具體地來說，誰能搞到更多的錢就是誰的勝利。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …更具体地来说，谁能搞到更多的钱就是谁的胜利。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Artinya, siapa paling kaya menang.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quindi chiunque abbia più soldi vince.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): In altre parole, vince chi accumula più denaro di tutti.
Turkish (TR): ...Yani kim daha çok paraya sahipse o kazanır.

Steam (ST): Unless Hideyoshi could obtain a large sum of money at this critical time, he could easily lose all he had built so far...
Umineko Project (UP): If Hideyoshi could obtain a large sum of money at this critical time, he would be able to avoid losing all of that which he had built up...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If Hideyoshi could obtain a large sum of money at this critical time, he would be able to avoid losing all of that which he had built up...
PC Japanese (JP): 秀吉は大量の金を手に入れなければ、自分が育て上げてきたもの全てを失いかねない瀬戸際にいたのである…。
Russian (RU): Если бы Хидэёши удалось получить крупную сумму денег в это столь критическое для него время, то он смог бы избежать потери всего того, что он создал...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se Hideyoshi pudesse obter uma grande quantidade de dinheiro durante esse período crítico, ele poderia evitar perder tudo que havia construído...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "And you, Rudolf, have been in quite a lot of trouble lately too, haven't you? You always hear people say it's terrifying overseas, but it seems it really is true. American trials are settled quite emotionally. They never hand down generous judgements to foreigners. ......Weren't you advised by your lawyer that making a settlement with the other party would be more economical in the long run?"
Umineko Project (UP): "And you, Rudolf, you've been in a lot of trouble lately, haven't you? They say it's scary overseas, but it seems that's really true. American trials are settled quite emotionally. They won't give a generous judgment to a foreigner. ......Weren't you advised by your lawyer that making a settlement with the other party would be more economical in the end?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "And you, Rudolf, you've been in a lot of trouble lately, haven't you? They say it's scary overseas, but it seems that's really true. American trials are settled quite emotionally. They won't give a generous judgement to a foreigner. ......Weren't you advised by your lawyer that making a settlement with the other party would be more economical in the end?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「留弗夫の方も、最近は大変だそうじゃないかね。海外は怖いとよく言うが、本当にそうらしいな。アメリカの裁判は極めて感情的に決まる。彼らは外国人に寛大な判決など出しはしない。……先方と和解した方が結局は安上がりになると弁護士に忠告を受けたんじゃないのかね？」
Russian (RU): "А ты, Рудольф, в последнее время столкнулся с множеством неприятностей, не так ли? Говорят, что работать с заграницей — это сущий кошмар, но похоже это действительно правда. Американский судебный процесс не освобожден от эмоций. Они не будут столь снисходительны по отношению к иностранцу. ......Разве твой адвокат не сказал, что самому договориться с другой стороной тебе обошлось бы гораздо дешевле?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "E você, Rudolf, tem tido diversos problemas ultimamente, não? Dizem que o exterior é assustador, parece que é verdade. Julgamentos americanos não são resolvidos com o emocional. Eles não dão a um estrangeiro um julgamento mais generoso. ......Você não foi aconselhado pelo seu advogado que fazer um acordo com a outra parte seria mais econômico no final?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「留弗夫最近好像也挺不走運啊。你經常說國外很可怕，好像真的是這樣呢。美國的法庭下判決是極其感情用事的。他們不會對外國人下寬大的判決。……有沒有從律師那聽到過，和對方庭外和解的話可以少花點錢的忠告啊？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「留弗夫最近好像也挺不走运啊。你经常说国外很可怕，好像真的是这样呢。美国的法庭下判决是极其感情用事的。他们不会对外国人下宽大的判决。……有没有从律师那听到过，和对方庭外和解的话可以少花点钱的忠告啊？」
Indonesian (IDN): "Dan kau, Rudolf, akhir-akhir ini sedang banyak masalah, ya? Katanya menakutkan di luar negeri, ternyata benar. Pengadilan Amerika sangat emosional. Mereka tidak akan memberi puturan murah hati pada orang asing. ......Bukankah pengacaramu menyarankan berdamai lebih ekonomis?"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "E tu, Rudolf, sei stato parecchio in difficoltà ultimamente, non è vero? Dicono che sia spaventoso oltreoceano, ma sembra sia vero. I processi americani sono regolati piuttosto emotivamente. Non prendono molto in considerazione uno straniero. ... Non sei stato avvisato dal tuo avvocato che fare un patteggiamento con l'altra parte alla fine sarebbe stato più economico?"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "E anche tu, Rudolf, sei parecchio in difficoltà ultimamente, dico bene? Si dice che all'estero siano spietati, ma pare che sia vero. In America i processi vengono risolti con troppa passionalità. Non pronunciano mai verdetti indulgenti verso gli stranieri... Non sei stato avvisato dal tuo avvocato che in fin dei conti un patteggiamento sarebbe più economico?"
Turkish (TR): "Ve sen, Rudolf, son zamanlarda başın çok belaya girdi, değil mi? Yurtdışının korkutucu olduğunu söylüyorlar, ama görünüşe göre bu gerçekten doğru. Amerikan davaları oldukça duygusal bir şekilde sonuçlanır. Bir yabancıya cömert bir karar vermezler. ......Avukatınız size karşı tarafla anlaşmanın daha ekonomik olacağını söylemedi mi?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "That's right. In this world, anything can be settled with money. After all, it can even buy back the broken bonds between siblings! America is very fussy about the violation of rights. But with money, anything can be settled. Long live capitalism.
Umineko Project (UP): "That's right. In this world, anything can be settled with money. After all, it can even buy back the broken bonds between siblings! America is very fussy about the violation of rights. But with money, anything can be settled. Long live capitalism."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That's right. In this world, anything can be settled with money. After all, it can even buy back the broken bonds between siblings! America is very fussy about the violation of rights. But with money, anything can be settled. Long live capitalism.
PC Japanese (JP): 「その通りさ。世の中なんだってカネでケリが付く。失った兄弟の絆だって買い戻せるようにな！　アメリカは権利侵害などには五月蝿い国だ。だがカネさえあれば何でも和解できる。資本主義万歳だよ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「その通りさ。世の中なんだってカネでケリが付く。失った兄弟の絆だって買い戻せるようにな！　アメリカは権利侵害などには五月蝿い国だ。だがカネさえあれば何でも和解できる。資本主義万歳だよ」
Russian (RU): "Совершенно верно. В этом мире всё можно уладить при помощи денег. В конце концов, им даже под силу восстановить разорванные узы между родными братьями и сёстрами! Америка крайне щепетильна, когда речь заходит о нарушении прав. Но если есть деньги, то любой вопрос можно уладить. Да здравствует капитализм."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Isso mesmo. Nesse mundo, tudo pode ser resolvido com dinheiro. Afinal, ele pode até restaurar laços perdidos entre irmãos! Os Estados Unidos fazem muita confusão por causa de violação de direitos. Mas com dinheiro, tudo pode ser resolvido. Vida longa ao capitalismo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「說得對。世界上的一切都可以用錢解決。就如同失去的兄妹情也可以用錢買回來一樣！美國是個喜歡叫囂侵權什麼的煩人國家。但是只要有錢，做什麼都可以和解。資本主義萬歲。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「说得对。世界上的一切都可以用钱解决。就如同失去的兄妹情也可以用钱买回来一样！美国是个喜欢叫嚣侵权什么的烦人国家。但是只要有钱，做什么都可以和解。资本主义万岁。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Benar. Di dunia ini, segalanya bisa diselesaikan dengan uang. Bahkan bisa membeli kembali ikatan saudara yang retak! Amerika sangat rewel soal pelanggaran hak. Tapi dengan uang, segalanya bisa beres. Hidup kapitalisme."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Giusto. A questo mondo, tutto può essere risolto col denaro. Dopotutto, può anche riacquistare i legami spezzati fra fratelli! L'America è molto esigente circa la violazione dei diritti. Ma con il denaro, tutto può essere risolto. Lunga vita al capitalismo.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Esattamente. In questo mondo, tutto si può risolvere con il denaro. Può anche ricucire i rapporti tra fratelli che si sono distanziati fra loro! L'America è una nazione intransigente in tema di violazioni di diritti. Ma lì si può patteggiare su ogni questione, finché si ha del denaro. Viva il capitalismo..."
Turkish (TR): "Bu doğru. Bu dünyada parayla her şey halledilebilir. Hatta kardeşler arasında kopan bağlar bile parayla geri düzeltilebilir! Amerika hakların ihlali konusunda çok titizdir. Ama parayla her şey halledilebilir. Çok yaşa kapitalizm."

Original Witch Hunt (OG): For various reasons, it was thought that winning the trial was extremely unlikely, and Rudolf went for an all-out surrender.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): ".........Rosa, you're a good and noble little sister. You wouldn't even touch a dangerous money game. ...However, your softhearted nature was your ruin, wasn't it...? I wouldn't think one should agree to become a co-signer so lightly."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Rosa, you're a good and noble little sister. You wouldn't even touch a dangerous money game. ...However, your softhearted nature was your ruin, wasn't it...? I wouldn't think one should agree to become a co‐signer so lightly."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........Rosa, you're a good and noble little sister. You wouldn't even touch a dangerous money game. ...However, your softhearted nature was your ruin, wasn't it...? I wouldn't think one should agree to become a co-signer so lightly."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………楼座は清く正しい妹だ。危険なマネーゲーム等には手を出さない。…だが、お人好しな性分が災いしたんじゃないかね…？　連帯保証人は、気安く引き受けるものではないと思うがね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………楼座は清く正しい妹だ。危険なマネーゲーム等には手を出さない。…だが、お人好しな性分が災いしたんじゃないかね…？　連帯保証人は、気安く引き受けるものではないと思うがね」
Russian (RU): ".........Роза, ты хорошая и благородная младшая сестра. Ты бы ни за какие коврижки не стала бы играть в опасные денежные игры. ...Вот только твоя отзывчивость довела тебя до разорения, разве не так?.. Я не думаю, что тебе следовало так запросто становиться поручителем."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Rosa, você é uma boa e nobre irmãzinha. Você não chegaria perto do perigoso jogo do dinheiro. ...No entanto, a sua natureza generosa foi a sua ruína, não foi...? Eu não pensei que alguém aceitaria se tornar uma fiadora tão facilmente."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………樓座是個潔身自好的好妹妹啊。不會出手去玩危險的金錢遊戲。…只是，老好人的性格不正是會引禍上身嗎…？我覺得不該這麼爽快地答應當別人的連帶保證人呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………楼座是个洁身自好的好妹妹啊。不会出手去玩危险的金钱游戏。…只是，老好人的性格不正是会引祸上身吗…？我觉得不该这么爽快地答应当别人的连带保证人呢。」
Indonesian (IDN): ".........Rosa, kau adik yang baik dan mulia. Kau bahkan tidak menyentuh permainan uang berbahaya. ...Tapi sifatmu yang terlalu baik merugikanmu, bukan...? Seharusnya kau tidak begitu mudah setuju menjadi penandatangan bersama."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Rosa, tu sei una magnanima e buona sorella minore. Non prenderesti mai parte ad un pericoloso gioco di soldi. ... Tuttavia, il tuo cuore tenero è stato la tua rovina, non è vero...? Penso che diventare cofirmatario non sia una cosa da prendere così alla leggera."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Rosa, tu sei una sorella minore buona e onesta. Non ti immischieresti mai in speculazioni rischiose... Ma il tuo cuore tenero è stata la tua rovina, vero...? Non credo che diventare cogarante sia qualcosa da prendere alla leggera."
Turkish (TR): ".........Rosa, sen iyi ve asil bir kız kardeşsin. Tehlikeli bir para oyununa elini bile sürmezsin. ...Ancak, yumuşak kalpliliğin seni mahvetti, değil mi...? Birinin bu kadar kolay kefil olmayı kabul edeceğini sanmazdım."

Steam (ST): After all, the person the younger siblings were threatening...was the only one who had no urgent need for a large sum of money.
Umineko Project (UP): Because only Krauss, who they were threatening, had no urgent need for a large sum of money.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Because only Krauss, who they were threatening, had no urgent need for a large sum of money.

Umineko Project (UP): Compared to that, the three who were threatening him wanted money quickly, no matter what the cost.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Compared to that, the three who were threatening him wanted money quickly, no matter what the cost.

Steam (ST): Therefore, he had hidden his knowledge until the very end, striking back only after analyzing their attitudes.
Umineko Project (UP): Therefore, he had hidden that until the very end, and, upon closely and completely examining their attitude, he had struck back.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Therefore, he had hidden that until the very end, and, upon closely and completely examining their attitude, he had struck back.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 因此他等到了最后的最后，把他们谈判时的态度全看透了才进行反击。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "If it were possible, I would like nothing more than to raise some money for my adorable siblings in their time of need. ...But unfortunately, I have nothing on hand.
Umineko Project (UP): "If I could, I would love to raise some money for my darling brother and sisters in their time of need. ...But unfortunately, I have nothing on hand."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "If I could, I would love to raise some money for my cute brother and sisters in their time of need. ...But unfortunately, I have nothing on hand.
PC Japanese (JP): 「私もできることなら、可愛い弟や妹たちの危機に金を工面してやりたいと思っているよ。…だが残念なことに持ち合わせがなくてね。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「無論だ。難解に作った。…だが、お前も挑め。それが我が魔法の奇跡を呼ぶ糧となる。誰もが挑み、誰にも至れなかったら、その時はその時」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É claro. Eu o fiz difícil. ...Mas você também deve desafiá‐lo. Essa será a semente com a qual o milagre da minha magia será invocada. Se todos tentarem resolvê‐lo, e todos falharem, isto vai acontecer."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这是当然的。做得就是这么难解。…不过，你也来挑战。这会成为唤来我的魔法奇迹的食粮。若是每一个人都来挑战，却没有一个人抵达谜底的话，那时的事就到那时再说。」

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Certamente. Io l'ho fatto difficile. ... Ma anche tu dovresti prendere parte alla sfida. Ciò che diventerà il seme con cui il miracolo della mia magia sarà evocato. Se tutti prendessero parte alla sfida, e tutti fallissero, sarà così.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......É um mecanismo que Kinzo, incapaz de confiar em seus parentes, tinha criado para se trancar sozinho em seu estúdio e se isolar do mundo exterior.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這是金藏——不相信任何親人，還把自己關在了書房中，與外界隔離開來的金藏，設置的一道意為拒絕的裝置。

Indonesian (IDN): ......Mekanisme ini dibuat Kinzo yang tak bisa mempercayai kerabat sedarahnya, untuk mengurung diri di ruang belajarnya dan mengisolasi diri dari dunia luar.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Era un meccanismo che Kinzo, incapace di fidarsi dei suoi parenti di sangue, aveva creato per chiudersi dentro il proprio studio e isolarsi dal mondo esterno.

Steam (ST): He was already unable to trust anyone excepting, not the children who shared his blood, but those servants who called themselves furniture...

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Lui era già incapace di fidarsi di qualcuno eccetto, non i figli con cui ha condiviso il suo sangue, ma con quei servi che definivano se stessi mobili...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ad eccezione di quei servi che si definivano mobili, ormai aveva perso la fiducia nei confronti di chiunque, inclusi i suoi figli, sangue del suo sangue...

Umineko Project (UP): "...Ah, Genji‐san. Oh, it's just that I had no place in there anymore."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...Ah, Genji-san. Oh, it's just that there is no place for me to be anymore."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…あぁ、源次さん。いや何、居場所がなくなりましてな」

Steam (ST): With a bitter laugh, Nanjo turned to face the door to the parlor.
Umineko Project (UP): With a bitter laugh, Nanjo turned to face the door to the parlor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Umineko Project (UP): For the most part, Genji also understood the family's situation.

Steam (ST): ...It must have made him want to frown, knowing that right now in the lounge, the master he served was being discussed so disrespectfully.
Umineko Project (UP): ...It must have made him want to frown, knowing that right now in the parlor, the master he served was being discussed so disrespectfully.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...It must have made him want to frown, knowing that right now in the lounge, the master he served was being discussed so disrespectfully.

Steam (ST): But it would have been very difficult to gather that from his indifferent expression.

Speaker: Nanjo Terumasa
Steam (ST): "......Still, ...I don't understand. ...Why did Kinzo-san have something so provocative written, I wonder."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Still, ...it isn't clear to me. ...Why did Kinzo‐san have something so provocative written, I wonder."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........But, ...I don't understand. ...Why did Kinzo-san have something so provocative written, I wonder."

Speaker: Ronoue Genji
Steam (ST): "......I do not presume to understand the Master's thoughts. However, I'm sure he had a deep reason for doing so."
Umineko Project (UP): "...............I fail to understand the Master's thoughts. I sense that they run very deep."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "............I don't presume to understand the Master's thoughts. However, I have realized that those thoughts are very deep."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……………私には、お館様のお考えはわかりかねます。深いお考えがあってのこととお察しします」

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Non pretendo di capire quali siano i pensieri del padrone. Tuttavia, posso presumere che ci abbia pensato a lungo."

Speaker: Nanjo Terumasa
Steam (ST): "Since long ago, when Kinzo-san played chess, he would always prepare his moves according to some far-reaching judgement. Yes, sometimes even to make moves I couldn't understand. ......For an average person like me, it was impossible to see through to whatever it was he was planning..."
Umineko Project (UP): "......For as long as I can remember, whenever Kinzo‐san played chess, he would always make moves based on some far‐sighted reading of the board. Yes, sometimes even moves that were incomprehensible. ......For an average person like me, it is impossible to see through to whatever it is he's planning..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Since long ago, when Kinzo-san played chess, he would always prepare his moves according to some far-reaching judgement. Yes, sometimes even to make moves I couldn't understand. ......For an average person like me, it was impossible to see through to whatever it was he was planning..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……金蔵さんのチェスは、昔からずいぶんと遠大な読みで布石を打たれるものでした。いや、時には理解できない一手さえ。……私如き凡庸では、何を目論まれているのか、皆目見当も付きませんな…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……金蔵さんのチェスは、昔からずいぶんと遠大な読みで布石を打たれるものでした。いや、時には理解できない一手さえ。……私如き凡庸では、何を目論まれているのか、皆目見当も付きませんな…」
Russian (RU): "Очень давно, когда Кинзо‐сан играл в шахматы, он всегда готовил ходы, руководствуясь каким то дальнозорким суждением. Да, иногда он делал ходы, которые я не мог понять. ......Такому среднестатистическому человеку, как я, было не по силам проникнуть в его замыслы..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Desde que consigo me lembrar, quando o Kinzo‐san jogava xadrez, ele sempre fazia seus movimentos baseados em alguma leitura do tabuleiro de grande alcance. Sim, muita vezes até os movimentos eram incompreensíveis. ......Para uma pessoa comum como eu, é impossível entender o que ele está pensando..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……金藏先生在下棋的時候，一直都是深謀遠慮，每一步都看準了後面幾步棋。有幾手甚至連我也看不出他的用意。……他到底是在策劃著幹什麼呢？如我這等凡庸之輩是一點都猜讀不出來啊…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……金藏先生在下棋的时候，一直都是深谋远虑，每一步都看准了后面几步棋。有几手甚至连我也看不出他的用意。……他到底是在策划着干什么呢？如我这等凡庸之辈是一点都猜读不出来啊…」
Indonesian (IDN): "......Seingatku, setiap kali Kinzo-san bermain catur, dia selalu membuat langkah berdasarkan perhitungan jauh ke depan. Ya, terkadang bahkan langkah yang tidak bisa dipahami. ......Bagi orang biasa sepertiku, mustahil menembus apa pun yang dia rencanakan..."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sin da parecchio tempo fa, quando Kinzo-san giocava a scacchi, lui preparava sempre le sue mosse in base a delle decisioni lungimiranti. Sì, qualche volta anche per fare mosse che io non riuscivo a capire. ... Per una persona normale come me, era impossibile capire qualunque cosa lui stesse pianificando..."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Preparare le sue mosse con previsioni molto lontane nel futuro è sempre stato lo stile di scacchi di Kinzo. Anzi, a volte fa anche mosse che non riesco a capire...Per una persona qualunque come me, è impossibile presagire cosa stia pianificando..."
Turkish (TR): "......Hatırlayabildiğim kadarıyla, Kinzo-san ne zaman satranç oynasa, hamlelerini hep tahtanın uzak görüşlü bir analizine dayanarak yapardı. Evet, bazen anlaşılmaz hamleler bile yapardı. ......Benim gibi ortalama bir insan için, planladığı şeyin ne olduğunu anlamak imkansız..."

Speaker: Ronoue Genji
Steam (ST): "Sometimes I wonder if this might be some kind of will, in the Master's eyes. ......Perhaps he wishes to hand over his wealth and title to the one who can understand it."
Umineko Project (UP): "I personally suspect this may be some kind of will from the Master. .........He most likely intends to entrust his assets and the family headship to whoever manages to comprehend it."

Steam (ST): {e:070:Behold the sweetfish river running through my beloved hometown. {n}You who seek the Golden Land, follow its path downstream in search of the key. {n}{n}As you travel down it, you will see a village. {n}In that village, look for the shore the two will tell you of. {n}There sleeps the key to the Golden Land. {n}{n}The one who obtains the key must then travel to the Golden Land in accordance with these rules.}
Umineko Project (UP): {e:070:Behold the sweetfish river, running through my beloved home of old.{n}You who seek the Golden Land, follow its path downstream in search of the key.{n}{n}As you travel down it, you will see a village.{n}In that village, look for the shore the two speak of.{n}There the key to the Golden Land sleeps.{n}{n}You who laid hand upon the key must journey as follows to the Golden Land.}
Original Witch Hunt (OG): My beloved hometown, the sweetfish river running through it. You who seek the Golden Land, follow its path downstream and seek the key. If you follow the river downstream, you will find a village. In the village, look for the shore the two will tell you of. There sleeps the key to the Golden Land. He who lays hand upon the key shall travel under the rules below.
PC Japanese (JP): {e:070:懐かしき、故郷を貫く鮎の川。{n}黄金郷を目指す者よ、これを下りて鍵を探せ。{n}{n}川を下れば、やがて里あり。{n}その里にて二人が口にし岸を探れ。{n}そこに黄金郷への鍵が眠る。{n}{n}鍵を手にせし者は、以下に従いて黄金郷へ旅立つべし。}
Russian (RU): {e:070:Через край родной мой, отрада моя, изобильная айю река катит воды свои.{n}Ты, кто ищет Золотую Землю, за её течением вниз последуй в поисках желанного ключа.{n}{n}По течению вниз спустившись, набредёшь ты на деревню.{n}В ней разыщи ты берег, о котором тебе расскажут двое.{n}Там ключ ты к Золотой Земле найдёшь.{n}{n}Когда же ключ ты обретёшь, отправься в путь, условия блюдя.}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): {e:070:O rio dos ayus passa pela minha amada cidade passada.{n}Aqueles que almejam pela Terra Dourada, sigam rio abaixo e procurem pela chave.{n}{n}Quando você descer o rio, encontrará um vilarejo.{n}Nele, procure pela costa da qual as duas pessoas falam.{n}Lá dorme a chave para a Terra Dourada.{n}{n}Aquele que obtiver a chave deve seguir a seguinte ordem para chegar à Terra Dourada.}
Chinese Traditional (CHT): {e:070:令人懷念的，貫穿故鄉的鮎之川。{n}追尋黃金鄉之人啊，沿其而下尋找鑰匙吧。{n}{n}沿川而下，終會發現“里”。{n}於其“里”尋找兩人開口之岸吧。{n}其中沉眠著通往黃金鄉的鑰匙。{n}{n}得到鑰匙的人啊，應遵循以下所記踏上黃金鄉之旅。}
Chinese Simplified (CN): {e:070:令人怀念的，贯穿故乡的鲇之川。{n}追寻黄金乡之人啊，沿其而下寻找钥匙吧。{n}{n}沿川而下，终会发现“里”。{n}于其“里”寻找两人开口之岸吧。{n}其中沉眠着通往黄金乡的钥匙。{n}{n}得到钥匙的人啊，应遵循以下所记踏上黄金乡之旅。}
Indonesian (IDN): {e:070:Lihatlah sungai ikan sweetfish, mengalir melalui rumah lamaku yang tercinta.{n}Kau yang mencari Tanah Emas, ikuti jalurnya ke hilir mencari kunci.{n}{n}Saat kau menyusurinya, kau akan melihat sebuah desa.{n}Di desa itu, carilah pantai yang dibicarakan dua orang.{n}Di sana kunci menuju Tanah Emas tertidur.{n}{n}Kau yang menyentuh kunci harus melakukan perjalanan sebagai berikut menuju Tanah Emas.}
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ammira il fiume di ayu che scorre attraverso la mia amata terra natia. Tu che cerchi la Terra Dorata, segui il suo corso secondo la corrente in cerca della chiave. Seguendone il percorso, vedrai un villaggio. In quel villaggio, cerca la costa di cui i due ti parleranno. {n}Lì riposa la chiave per la Terra Dorata. Colui che otterrà la chiave dovrà quindi viaggiare verso la Terra Dorata seguendo queste regole.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il fiume degli ayu, che attraversa la mia cara terra natia.{n}Tu che aneli la Terra Dorata, cerca la chiave, percorrendo il suo corso verso la foce.{n}Seguendone il percorso, vedrai infine un villaggio.{n}In quel villaggio, cerca la costa di cui i due ti parleranno.{n}Lì giacerà la chiave per la Terra Dorata.{n}Colui che impugnerà la chiave imbarcherà un viaggio lungo la Terra Dorata, in conformità con le seguenti regole.
Turkish (TR): {e:070:Tatlı balık nehrine bakın, sevgili memleketimin üzerinden geçen.{n}Anahtarın arayışında, akıntı yönündeki patikayı takip edeceksiniz, Altın Diyar'ın peşinde olan sizler.{n}{n}Bir köy göreceksiniz, patikada ilerlerken.{n}Sizler, düşün peşine ve ilerleyin, köydeki o ikilinin size bahsettiği kıyıya.{n}Orada yatmaktadır, Altın Diyar'ın anahtarı.{n}{n}Bu kurallara uyarak Altın Diyar'a seyahat etmelidir, anahtarı uyandıran kişi.}

Steam (ST): {e:070:On the first twilight, offer the six chosen by the key as sacrifices. {n}On the second twilight, those who remain shall tear apart the two who are close. {n}On the third twilight, those who remain shall praise my noble name. {n}On the fourth twilight, gouge the head and kill. {n}On the fifth twilight, gouge the chest and kill. {n}On the sixth twilight, gouge the stomach and kill. {n}On the seventh twilight, gouge the knee and kill. {n}On the eighth twilight, gouge the leg and kill. {n}On the ninth twilight, the witch shall revive, and none shall be left alive. {n}On the tenth twilight, at journey's end, you shall attain to the power of the Golden Land's treasures, once and for the last time.}
Umineko Project (UP): {e:070:On the first twilight, sacrifice the six chosen by the key.{n}On the second twilight, those who remain shall tear apart the two who are close.{n}On the third twilight, those who remain shall praise my noble name.{n}On the fourth twilight, gouge the head and kill.{n}On the fifth twilight, gouge the chest and kill.{n}On the sixth twilight, gouge the stomach and kill.{n}On the seventh twilight, gouge the knee and kill.{n}On the eighth twilight, gouge the leg and kill.{n}On the ninth twilight, the witch revives, and none shall be left alive.{n}On the tenth twilight, the journey ends, and you shall reach the Home of the Gold.}
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At the first twilight, you shall lift up as sacrifice the six chosen by the key. At the second twilight, those who remain shall tear apart the two who are close. At the third twilight, those who remain shall praise my honorable name on high. At the fourth twilight, gouge the head and kill. At the fifth twilight, gouge the chest and kill. At the sixth twilight, gouge the stomach and kill. At the seventh twilight, gouge the knee and kill. At the eighth twilight, gouge the leg and kill. At the ninth twilight, the witch shall be revived and none shall be left alive. At the tenth twilight, the journey shall end and you should reach the village of gold.
PC Japanese (JP): {e:070:第一の晩に、鍵の選びし六人を生贄に捧げよ。{n}第二の晩に、残されし者は寄り添う二人を引き裂け。{n}第三の晩に、残されし者は誉れ高き我が名を讃えよ。{n}第四の晩に、頭をえぐりて殺せ。{n}第五の晩に、胸をえぐりて殺せ。{n}第六の晩に、腹をえぐりて殺せ。{n}第七の晩に、膝をえぐりて殺せ。{n}第八の晩に、足をえぐりて殺せ。{n}第九の晩に、魔女は蘇り、誰も生き残れはしない。{n}第十の晩に、旅は終わり、黄金の郷に至るだろう。}
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): {e:070:第一の晩に、鍵の選びし六人を生贄に捧げよ。{n}第二の晩に、残されし者は寄り添う二人を引き裂け。{n}第三の晩に、残されし者は誉れ高き我が名を讃えよ。{n}第四の晩に、頭を抉りて殺せ。{n}第五の晩に、胸を抉りて殺せ。{n}第六の晩に、腹を抉りて殺せ。{n}第七の晩に、膝を抉りて殺せ。{n}第八の晩に、足を抉りて殺せ。{n}第九の晩に、魔女は蘇り、誰も生き残れはしない。{n}第十の晩に、旅は終わり、黄金の郷に至るだろう。}
Russian (RU): {e:070:В первые сумерки ключ изберёт шестерых — в жертву их принеси.{n}Вторые сумерки — оставшиеся разлуку паре принести должны, в которой оба дороги друг другу.{n}На третьи сумерки, кто выжил, тем славить имя благородное моё.{n}К четвёртым — дыру проделав в голове вращеньем, умертви.{n}К пятым — дыру проделав во груди вращеньем, умертви.{n}К шестым — дыру проделав в животе вращеньем, умертви.{n}К седьмым — дыру проделав в колене вращеньем, умертви.{n}К восьмым — дыру проделав во стопе вращеньем, умертви.{n}К девятым сумеркам же возродится ведьма, и кто в живых остался — будет мёртв.{n}К десятым сумеркам конец пути настанет — к истоку золота дорога приведёт.}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): {e:070:No primeiro crepúsculo, você deve oferecer como sacrifício os seis escolhidos pela chave.{n}No segundo crepúsculo, os remanescentes devem separar os dois que são próximos.{n}No terceiro crepúsculo, aqueles que restaram devem louvar o meu nome em alto e bom som.{n}No quarto crepúsculo, goive a cabeça e mate.{n}No quinto crepúsculo, goive o peito e mate.{n}No sexto crepúsculo, goive o estômago e mate.{n}No sétimo crepúsculo, goive o joelho e mate.{n}No oitavo crepúsculo, goive a perna e mate.{n}No nono crepúsculo, a bruxa reviverá e ninguém deve sobreviver.{n}No décimo crepúsculo, a jornada chegará ao seu fim, e você alcançará a Vila do Ouro.}
Chinese Traditional (CHT): {e:070:第一晚，獻上鑰匙選中的六名活祭吧。{n}第二晚，余下的人撕裂那緊靠的兩人。{n}第三晚，余下的人讚頌吾高貴之名吧。{n}第四晚，剜頭殺之。{n}第五晚，剜胸殺之。{n}第六晚，剜腹殺之。{n}第七晚，剜膝殺之。{n}第八晚，剜足殺之。{n}第九晚，魔女復甦，無人生還。{n}第十晚，旅途結束，終會抵達黃金之鄉。}
Chinese Simplified (CN): {e:070:第一晚，献上钥匙选中的六名活祭吧。{n}第二晚，余下的人撕裂那紧靠的两人。{n}第三晚，余下的人赞颂吾高贵之名吧。{n}第四晚，剜头杀之。{n}第五晚，剜胸杀之。{n}第六晚，剜腹杀之。{n}第七晚，剜膝杀之。{n}第八晚，剜足杀之。{n}第九晚，魔女复苏，无人生还。{n}第十晚，旅途结束，终会抵达黄金之乡。}
Indonesian (IDN): {e:070:Pada senja pertama, korbankan enam yang terpilih oleh kunci.{n}Pada senja kedua, yang tersisa akan merobek dua yang dekat.{n}Pada senja ketiga, yang tersisa akan memuji namaku yang mulia.{n}Pada senja keempat, cabut kepala dan bunuh.{n}Pada senja kelima, cabut dada dan bunuh.{n}Pada senja keenam, cabut perut dan bunuh.{n}Pada senja ketujuh, cabut lutut dan bunuh.{n}Pada senja kedelapan, cabut kaki dan bunuh.{n}Pada senja kesembilan, sang penyihir bangkit, dan tak ada yang tersisa hidup.{n}Pada senja kesepuluh, perjalanan berakhir, dan kau akan tiba di Rumah Emas.}
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Al primo crepuscolo, offri in sacrificio i sei scelti dalla chiave. Al secondo crepuscolo, coloro che rimangono divideranno i due che sono vicini. Al terzo crepuscolo, coloro che rimangono loderanno il mio nobile nome. Al quarto crepuscolo, perfora la testa e uccidi. Al quinto crepuscolo, perfora il petto e uccidi. Al sesto crepuscolo, perfora lo stomaco e uccidi. Al settimo crepuscolo, perfora il ginocchio e uccidi. All'ottavo crepuscolo, perfora la gamba e uccidi. Al nono crepuscolo, la strega risorgerà, e nessuno sarà lasciato in vita. Al decimo crepuscolo, il viaggio avrà fine, e raggiungerai la capitale ove l'oro risiede.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): {n}Al primo crepuscolo, offri come sacrifici le sei vittime scelte dalla chiave.{n}Al secondo crepuscolo, i rimanenti divideranno i due che sono vicini.{n}Al terzo crepuscolo, i rimanenti loderanno il mio glorioso nome.{n}Al quarto crepuscolo, fora la sua testa e uccidilo.{n}Al quinto crepuscolo, fora il suo petto e uccidilo.{n}Al sesto crepuscolo, fora la sua pancia e uccidilo.{n}Al settimo crepuscolo, fora il suo ginocchio e uccidilo.{n}All'ottavo crepuscolo, fora la sua gamba e uccidilo.{n}Al nono crepuscolo, la strega risorgerà, e nessuno verrà lasciato in vita.{n}Al decimo crepuscolo, il viaggio si concluderà, e giungerai alla terra ove l'oro risiede.
Turkish (TR): {e:070:İlk alacakaranlıkta, anahtar tarafından seçilen altısı kurban olarak sunulacak.{n}İkinci alacakaranlıkta, geride kalanlar yakın olan ikisini birbirinden ayıracak.{n}Üçüncü alacakaranlıkta, hayatta kalanlar asil ismimi yüceltecek.{n}Dördüncü alacakaranlıkta, kafasını oy ve öldür.{n}Beşinci alacakaranlıkta, göğsünü oy ve öldür.{n}Altıncı alacakaranlıkta, karnını oy ve öldür.{n}Yedinci alacakaranlıkta, dizini oy ve öldür.{n}Sekizinci alacakaranlıkta, bacağını oy ve öldür.{n}Dokuzuncu alacakaranlıkta, cadı dirilecek, ve hiçbiri hayatta kalmayacak.{n}Onuncu alacakaranlıkta, yolculuk sona erecek, ve Altın Vatan'a kavuşacaksın.}

Steam (ST): {e:070:The witch shall praise the wise and bestow four treasures. {n}{n}One shall be all the gold from the Golden Land. {n}One shall be the resurrection of all the dead souls. {n}One shall be the resurrection of the love that was lost. {n}One shall be to put the witch to sleep for all time. {n}{n}Sleep peacefully, my beloved witch, {f:5:Beatrice}.}
Umineko Project (UP): {e:070:The witch shall praise the wise, and bestow four treasures.{n}{n}One shall be all of the Golden Land's gold.{n}One resurrects all the dead people's souls.{n}One even revives all the love they possessed.{n}And one for the witch to eternally rest.{n}{n}Rest in peace, my beloved witch, {f:5:Beatrice}.}
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The witch will praise the wise, and should bestow four treasures. One shall be, all the gold from the Golden Land. One shall be, the resurrection of the souls of all the dead. One shall be, even the resurrection of the lost love. One shall be, to put the witch to sleep for all time. Sleep peacefully, my most beloved witch, Beatrice.
PC Japanese (JP): {e:070:魔女は賢者を讃え、四つの宝を授けるだろう。{n}{n}一つは、黄金郷の全ての黄金。{n}一つは、全ての死者の魂を蘇らせ。{n}一つは、失った愛すらも蘇らせる。{n}一つは、魔女を永遠に眠りにつかせよう。{n}{n}安らかに眠れ、我が最愛の魔女ベアトリーチェ。}
Russian (RU): {e:070:Похвалит ведьма мудрых и вручит им четыре дара:{n}{n}Первый — всё золото, что в Золотой Земле.{n}Второй — из праха мёртвых воскрешение.{n}Третий — возвращение утраченной любви.{n}Четвёртый — ведьме сном забыться вечным.{n}{n}Покойся с миром, моя возлюбленная ведьма {f:5:Беатриче}.}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): {e:070:A bruxa elogiará o sábio, e lhe concederá quatro tesouros.{n}{n}Um deve ser todo ouro da Terra Dourada.{n}Um deve ser a ressurreição da alma de todos que foram mortos.{n}Um deve ser a ressurreição do amor perdido.{n}Um deve ser colocar a bruxa para dormir por toda a eternidade.{n}{n}Descanse em paz, minha amada bruxa, {f:5:Beatrice}.}
Chinese Traditional (CHT): {e:070:魔女定將讚頌賢者，授予四樣寶物。{n}{n}一是，黃金鄉之中的全部黃金。{n}一是，令所有死者的靈魂復甦。{n}一是，就連已逝的愛也會復甦。{n}一是，使魔女進入永遠的沉眠。{n}{n}安寧地睡吧，吾最愛的魔女貝阿朵莉切。}
Chinese Simplified (CN): {e:070:魔女定将赞颂贤者，授予四样宝物。{n}{n}一是，黄金乡之中的全部黄金。{n}一是，令所有死者的灵魂复苏。{n}一是，就连已逝的爱也会复苏。{n}一是，使魔女进入永远的沉眠。{n}{n}安宁地睡吧，吾最爱的魔女贝阿朵莉切。}
Indonesian (IDN): {e:070:Sang penyihir akan memuji yang bijak, dan menganugerahkan empat harta.{n}{n}Satu akan menjadi semua emas Tanah Emas.{n}Satu menghidupkan kembali semua jiwa yang mati.{n}Satu bahkan menghidupkan kembali semua cinta yang mereka miliki.{n}Dan satu untuk sang penyihir beristirahat abadi.{n}{n}Beristirahatlah dengan damai, penyihir tercintaku, {f:5:Beatrice}.}
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La strega loderà il saggio, e gli donerà quattro tesori. Uno sarà tutto l'oro della Terra Dorata. Uno sarà la resurrezione di tutte le anime dei morti. Uno sarà la resurrezione dell'amore che era andato perduto. Uno sarà mettere a dormire la strega per l'eternità. Dormi in pace, mia benamata strega, Beatrice.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): {n}La strega loderà la tua saggezza, e ti concederà quattro tesori.{n}Uno sarà tutto l'oro della Terra Dorata.{n}Uno sarà la resurrezione di tutte le anime dei morti.{n}Uno sarà persino la resurrezione dell'amore andato perduto.{n}Uno sarà il conferire alla strega un eterno riposo.{n}Riposa in pace, {f:5:Beatrice}, mia amatissima strega.
Turkish (TR): {e:070:Cadı bilgeleri övecek ve dört hazine bahşedecek.{n}{n}Biri Altın Diyar'ın bütün altınları olacak.{n}Biri tüm ölü ruhların dirilişi olacak.{n}Biri kaybedilmiş aşkın dirilişi olacak.{n}Ve birisi de cadıyı sonsuza dek uyutmak olacak.{n}{n}Huzur içinde uyu, sevgili cadım, {f:5:Beatrice}.}
